original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni mngon par brjod pa'i sngags kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni mngon par brjod pa'i sngags kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: Whoever is the nature of the mantra of expression.

original: ma bcings pa zhes bya ba ni ma zhen pa ste /
analyzed: ma bcings pa zhes bya ba ni ma zhen pa ste /
translated: Not bound means not attached.

original: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams la zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams la zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase to the collection of pacifying and other activities is an ellipsis.

original: de ni @154b bcings med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni @154b bcings med ces bya ba ni /
translated: That is unbound

original: 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin bya ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin bya ba byed pa'o //
translated: means acting as one wishes.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid goms pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid goms pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to one who is endowed with the practice of the reality of the wind.

original: rig ces bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin rtsa la rgyu ba'i rim pas zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rig ces bya ba ni rlung gi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin rtsa la rgyu ba'i rim pas zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúKnowledge‚Äù refers to the reality of the wind, in accordance with the process of its movement in the channels.

original: 'dod chags kyi chos ston pas na sbas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi chos ston pas na sbas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHidden‚Äù is because of the teaching of the Dharma of passion.

original: yang de nyid ston te /
analyzed: yang de nyid ston te /
translated: Again, that is taught:

original: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äù and so forth.

original: gcig ni mi rgyu ba brjod du med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin ther zug pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: gcig ni mi rgyu ba brjod du med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin ther zug pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äù is the non-moving, inexpressible, space-like, eternal syllable.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas so //
translated: ‚ÄúFirst‚Äù is the abode of the arising of all phenomena.

original: dgu dbus na zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga dang 'byung ba bzhi mthar thug pa yin te /
analyzed: dgu dbus na zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga dang 'byung ba bzhi mthar thug pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the middle of the nine‚Äù is the culmination of the five sense faculties and the four elements.

original: gnas de la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gnas de la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAbiding in that place‚Äù is the remainder of the verse.

original: bcu yis zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'o //
analyzed: bcu yis zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the ten‚Äù is the five sense faculties and the five objects.

original: 'di rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis so //
translated: It is by these.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhoever‚Äù is the yogi who has abandoned the mental consciousness.

original: ma bcings pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba bsten par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ma bcings pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba bsten par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase not bound means that one does not rely on distraction.

original: de ni bcings med ces bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i sems so //
analyzed: de ni bcings med ces bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i sems so //
translated: The phrase he is not bound means that his mind is not distracted.

original: shes byas nas zhes bya ba ni khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes byas nas zhes bya ba ni khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase having understood means having comprehended.

original: de zhes bya ba ni ye shes la mngon par brtson pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni ye shes la mngon par brtson pa'o //
translated: The phrase he refers to one who is intent on wisdom.

original: shes zhes bya ba'i nyams su myong ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba'i nyams su myong ba'i don to //
translated: The word knows means experience.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings mi shigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings mi shigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The word supreme means the characteristic of the indestructible expanse of reality.

original: rang rig pa'i ngo bo de nyams su mchog ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i ngo bo de nyams su mchog ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase he experiences the essence of self-awareness is supreme.

original: kun rdzob kyi don khong du chud pas na sbas pa nyid do //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi don khong du chud pas na sbas pa nyid do //
translated: The word hidden means that it is understood through its conventional meaning.

original: yang de nyid ston te gcig ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir rtogs par dka' ba //
analyzed: yang de nyid ston te gcig ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir rtogs par dka' ba //
translated: He also teaches that very same thing: the word one means that it is difficult to understand.

original: rtag par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo thig le yang mi shigs pa zhes pa chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la brten cing aa la gnas pa 'byung ba bzhi yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtag par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo thig le yang mi shigs pa zhes pa chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la brten cing aa la gnas pa 'byung ba bzhi yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The essence of the clear light which appears as the permanent is also called the indestructible drop. It is based on the Dharma wheel with eight spokes and is located in the A. It is the nature of the perfect knowledge of the four elements.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni dang po'i ye shes te /
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni dang po'i ye shes te /
translated: The first is the first intuition.

original: man ngag gi dus su thog mar de nyams su myong ba'o //üîΩdgu dbus na zhes bya ba ni padma 'dab ma brgya dpa'i 'dab ma la /
analyzed: man ngag gi dus su thog mar de nyams su myong ba'o // dgu dbus na zhes bya ba ni padma 'dab ma brgya dpa'i 'dab ma la /
translated: At the time of the esoteric instructions, one first experiences it.üîΩIn the middle of the nine is the experience of the essence of the drop.

original: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes bya ba brgyad dang / dgu pa thig le'u ngo bo nyams su myong ba yin te /
analyzed: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes bya ba brgyad dang / dgu pa thig le'u ngo bo nyams su myong ba yin te /
translated: On the petals of the hundred-petaled lotus, there are eight: a ka ca ·π≠a ta pa ya ≈õa, and the ninth is the drop.

original: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
analyzed: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúabiding‚Äù is the meaning of the words.

original: bcu yis zhes bya ba ni @155a * //
analyzed: bcu yis zhes bya ba ni @155a * //
translated: By the ten is

analyzed: sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i g-yeng ba rnams kyis so //
translated: by the distractions of the conceptual thoughts of the mind.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:üîΩThe conceptual thoughts of existence and nonexistence, superimposition and denial,

original: yod med dang ni sgro 'dogs skur 'debs rtogs pa dang // gcig dang du ma nyid dang khyad par med rtog pa //
analyzed: yod med dang ni sgro 'dogs skur 'debs rtogs pa dang // gcig dang du ma nyid dang khyad par med rtog pa //
translated: one and many, and nondifference,

original: don la ji bzhin ming ni mngon par zhen rtog pa //üîΩrgyal ba sras dang bcas pas yang dag spang bar bya //
analyzed: don la ji bzhin ming ni mngon par zhen rtog pa // rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas yang dag spang bar bya //
translated: The name is a conception of manifest adherence to the object just as it is.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is to be thoroughly abandoned by the Victor and his Sons.üîΩHe who, etc.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa la lhag par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //üîΩma bcings pa zhes bya ba ni zhen pa mi bstan pa'o //üîΩslong dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas kyis //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa la lhag par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o // ma bcings pa zhes bya ba ni zhen pa mi bstan pa'o // slong dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas kyis //
translated: The yogi who abides in non-conceptualization.

original: ji skad du ;üîΩ/ rnam par g-yeng ba bcu po yis //
analyzed: ji skad du ; / rnam par g-yeng ba bcu po yis //
translated: Unbound, etc.üîΩThe master Dignaga says:

original: sems ni gzhan du g-yengs pa na //
analyzed: sems ni gzhan du g-yengs pa na //
translated: The mind is distracted by ten kinds of distraction.

original: gnyis med ye shes sgrub pa yis //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes sgrub pa yis //
translated: The one who is intent on accomplishing non-dual intuition

analyzed: snod du byis pa 'gyur ma yin //

original: de ni spangs phyir phan tshun du //üîΩmi mthun pa dang gnyen po dag / shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
analyzed: de ni spangs phyir phan tshun du // mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dag / shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //

analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: aa la yongs su gnas pa'i thig le zhes bshad la /

analyzed: ye shes gsum rnam par dbye ba ston pa sbas pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gsum mo //

original: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: gcig ni mi 'gyur ba'i yi ge aa'o //

analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: mgrin snying lte ba @155b gsang ba yi //

analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: shes rab ni chos thams cad bdag med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: shes rab ni chos thams cad bdag med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Wisdom is the characteristic of thoroughly discerning all phenomena as selfless.

original: thabs ni snying rje chen @159b po'o //
analyzed: thabs ni snying rje chen @159b po'o //
translated: Skillful means is great compassion.

original: de dag gi gnas mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo bsgom pas na /
analyzed: de dag gi gnas mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo bsgom pas na /
translated: By cultivating the unchanging essence of those two,

original: de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags zlos par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags zlos par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: the practitioner who abides in that is said to be the reciter of the mantra.

original: da ni bzlas pa'i grangs ston te /
analyzed: da ni bzlas pa'i grangs ston te /
translated: Now the number of recitations is taught.

original: gos dkar mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gos dkar mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i lha mo bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i lha mo bzhi ste /

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sa ni spyan du shes par bya //
analyzed: sa ni spyan du shes par bya //

original: chu khams m'a ma k'ir bshad da //
analyzed: chu khams m'a ma k'ir bshad da //

original: me yi dkyil 'khor gos dkar mo //
analyzed: me yi dkyil 'khor gos dkar mo //

original: rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu grags //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu grags // zhes gsungs pa'o //

analyzed: de nye bar mtshon pa'i bzlas pa bya zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na ; lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga ni /

original: lha so so'i bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: lha so so'i bzlas pa ste /

analyzed: 'di skad du grangs kyi tshad dgu brgyar 'gyur ba'i phyir /

analyzed: lha mo re re la brgya phrag gnyis nyi shu lngar gsungs so //

original: rnam pa gzhan du na bdag po'i bzlas pa ma gtogs par lha mo'i bzlas pa ci ltar 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na bdag po'i bzlas pa ma gtogs par lha mo'i bzlas pa ci ltar 'byung zhe na /

analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ste /

original: bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe fourth and so on‚Äù means that the recitation of the lord is two hundred and twenty-five times.

original: legs par zhes bya ba ni blo ma yengs pas so //
analyzed: legs par zhes bya ba ni blo ma yengs pas so //

analyzed: sbyor ba bzhi zhes bya ba la /

original: grangs kyi sbyor ba 'dis nyin dang mtshan la nyi khri tshig stong drug brgya ste /
analyzed: grangs kyi sbyor ba 'dis nyin dang mtshan la nyi khri tshig stong drug brgya ste /
translated: This calculation of numbers is twenty-four thousand in a day and night.

original: bzlas pa'i grangs gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i grangs gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the statement of the number of repetitions.

original: nang gi dus kyi skad cig 'di nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston te /
analyzed: nang gi dus kyi skad cig 'di nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston te /

original: rig pa dang cho ga ni rig pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: rig pa dang cho ga ni rig pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: Knowledge and rite are the rite of knowledge.

original: zlas dbye pa'o //üîΩrig pa ni @160a * //
analyzed: zlas dbye pa'o // rig pa ni @160a * //
translated: This is a dvandva compound.

original: shes rab / cho ga ni thabs te /
analyzed: shes rab / cho ga ni thabs te /
translated: Knowledge is wisdom; rite is method.

original: de dag gi thabs kyi bya ba bsgom zhing goms pa de yis so //
analyzed: de dag gi thabs kyi bya ba bsgom zhing goms pa de yis so //
translated: By that method, the performance of the rite is meditation and familiarization.

original: gzhan yang thun mtshams bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus ni thun mtshams bzhi ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang thun mtshams bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nang gi bdag nyid can gyi dus ni thun mtshams bzhi ste /
translated: Moreover, ‚Äúthe four junctures,‚Äù and so on. The inner nature of time is the four junctures.

original: so so'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: so so'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Each is a ma·πá·∏çala.

original: rab tu sbyor ba ni rab tu 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba ni rab tu 'brel pa ste /
translated: Application is connection.

original: bsam zhing bsgom zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsam zhing bsgom zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúthink and meditate.‚Äù

original: de la thun mtshams bzhi ni tho rangs dang nyi ma phyed dang / nam sros kha dang / mtshan phyed de /
analyzed: de la thun mtshams bzhi ni tho rangs dang nyi ma phyed dang / nam sros kha dang / mtshan phyed de /
translated: The four periods are dawn, noon, dusk, and midnight.

original: de rab tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de rab tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: This is the application.

original: ma nyams bzlas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ma nyams bzlas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The recitation without break is as before.

original: tshan bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: tshan bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The four periods, etc.

original: tshan ni nang gi brda'i gnas te rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang zhig gi dbang du byas nas bsgom pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: tshan ni nang gi brda'i gnas te rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang zhig gi dbang du byas nas bsgom pa la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: The period is the inner symbolic place, which is the mandala of wind, etc. , in relation to which one engages in the meditation.

original: mtshan nyid ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems te /
translated: The characteristic is the mind in meditative equipoise,

original: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i yid gang gis de la nyin mtshan du dmigs shing sems pa'i mtshan nyid ces brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i yid gang gis de la nyin mtshan du dmigs shing sems pa'i mtshan nyid ces brjod do //
translated: by which one focuses on and contemplates day and night that, without distraction, is called the characteristic.

original: de dag gi grangs ni rgyun ma chad pa'i rtsis so //
analyzed: de dag gi grangs ni rgyun ma chad pa'i rtsis so //

original: 'di skad du gzhan du rnam par g-yeng ba thams cad yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: 'di skad du gzhan du rnam par g-yeng ba thams cad yongs su spangs nas /
translated: This is the idea: Having completely abandoned all other distractions,

original: sems nang du 'jog cing bsgoms pas /
analyzed: sems nang du 'jog cing bsgoms pas /
translated: one should place the mind within and meditate.

original: nyin re bzhin du bsam gtan bya //üîΩzhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: nyin re bzhin du bsam gtan bya //üîΩzhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: One should practice meditation every day.

original: de ni mthun pa'i chos ston te /
analyzed: de ni mthun pa'i chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma that is in accord with that.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snang bar gyur pa de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snang bar gyur pa de nyid kyis na /
translated: ‚Äú Externally‚Äù and so forth. By that very appearance,

original: bsgom pa la ma zhen pa'i rnal 'byor pa phyi rol gyi bzlas pa spong ba ste /
analyzed: bsgom pa la ma zhen pa'i rnal 'byor pa phyi rol gyi bzlas pa spong ba ste /
translated: the yogi who is not attached to meditation abandons external repetition.

original: 'dor ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dor ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: he casts it off.

original: sngags kyi phreng ba zlos pa ni phyi rol gyi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi phreng ba zlos pa ni phyi rol gyi bzlas pa'o //
translated: The repetition of the mantra garland is external repetition.

original: bar chad ni rnam par g-yeng ba'o //
analyzed: bar chad ni rnam par g-yeng ba'o //
translated: Obstruction is distraction.

original: bsgom pa'i ni zhes bya ba phyi rol gyi bzlas pa yin na /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i ni zhes bya ba phyi rol gyi bzlas pa yin na /
translated: If it is external repetition,

original: nang du dmigs shing sgom pa la yid dga' bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nang du dmigs shing sgom pa la yid dga' bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the mind will not delight in the meditation that is focused internally. This is the meaning.

original: de nyid la phan pa'i rgyu ston te /
analyzed: de nyid la phan pa'i rgyu ston te /
translated: The cause of benefit in that very [meditation] is taught:

original: sngags don zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sngags don zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe meaning of the mantra‚Äù and so forth.

original: sngags kyi don ni sngags don to //
analyzed: sngags kyi don ni sngags don to //
translated: The meaning of the mantra is the meaning of the mantra.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: The nature of what is to be accomplished is the result.

original: lha nyid rdzogs pa zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: lha nyid rdzogs pa zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to ‚Äúthe perfection of the deity.‚Äù

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can zhes bya ba ste rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can zhes bya ba ste rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
translated: The Blessed One is the Vajra Holder, that is, Vajradhara himself.

original: gal te de'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ci lta bar bzlas pa zlos par @160b byed pa ste /
analyzed: gal te de'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ci lta bar bzlas pa zlos par @160b byed pa ste /
translated: If one is a yogin of his nature, one recites the recitation,

original: 'bras bu'i dus su rgyu yongs su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus su rgyu yongs su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at the time of the result, the cause is transformed.

original: dpe ston te glang po'i mngon du zhes bya ba kha cig  tu 'di ltar grags te glang po bskyod pa'i gang gas shing glang po ches mtshan mo phyung ste bros par gyur to //
analyzed: dpe ston te glang po'i mngon du zhes bya ba kha cig  tu 'di ltar grags te glang po bskyod pa'i gang gas shing glang po ches mtshan mo phyung ste bros par gyur to //
translated: An example is given: In some places it is known thus: In the elephant's presence, where a certain elephant keeper's house was destroyed by an elephant at night, and the elephant ran away.

original: glang rdzi de yang nang par tho rangs 'di ltar shin tu sems par gyur to //
analyzed: glang rdzi de yang nang par tho rangs 'di ltar shin tu sems par gyur to //
translated: And that elephant keeper, at dawn, thought like this:

original: kye ma'o kyi hung kho bo cag gi ngo bo ni mgu bar dka' ba ste /
analyzed: kye ma'o kyi hung kho bo cag gi ngo bo ni mgu bar dka' ba ste /
translated: Alas, alas! Our nature is difficult to please.

original: glang po bzang skyong dregs pa'i dbang gis gang du song /
analyzed: glang po bzang skyong dregs pa'i dbang gis gang du song /
translated: Where did the proud and good elephant go?

original: 'di ji ltar rnyed par bya zhes yun ring du yang dang yang sems shing de'i skad cig na 'di lta bu'i dran pa rnyed de re zheg  sems shing cang mi smra bar gnas so //
analyzed: 'di ji ltar rnyed par bya zhes yun ring du yang dang yang sems shing de'i skad cig na 'di lta bu'i dran pa rnyed de re zheg  sems shing cang mi smra bar gnas so //
translated: He thinks about it again and again for a long time. At that moment, he finds such mindfulness. He thinks, ‚ÄúI will find it by following the tracks of the elephant.‚Äù

original: kho bos ni thabs rnyed de /
analyzed: kho bos ni thabs rnyed de /
translated: He thinks, ‚ÄúI have found a method.

original: gang 'di'i rjes ni shin tu che bas mtshon te rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: gang 'di'i rjes ni shin tu che bas mtshon te rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: I will find it by following the tracks of the elephant.‚Äù

original: de nas de'i rjes su 'jug pa rtsom par byed do //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes su 'jug pa rtsom par byed do //
translated: Then he begins to follow the tracks of the elephant.

original: bzang skyod de yang yun ring du phyin nas dregs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi bslab pa rjes su dran nas rang nyid gdags shing gi drung du phyin te gnas so //üîΩ'di ltar dgos pa rnyed nas nge'i rkang rjes tshol ba la yang dgos pa ci yang med de /
analyzed: bzang skyod de yang yun ring du phyin nas dregs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi bslab pa rjes su dran nas rang nyid gdags shing gi drung du phyin te gnas so // 'di ltar dgos pa rnyed nas nge'i rkang rjes tshol ba la yang dgos pa ci yang med de /
translated: After going for a long time, he becomes free from pride. Remembering the training, he goes to the foot of a tree and stays there.üîΩHaving found the purpose, he thinks, ‚ÄúWhat is the purpose of searching for the tracks of the elephant?‚Äù

original: gal te de'i skad cig ni glang po che de rnyed na ji zhig de'i rjes tshol bar byed ces bya ba ni bcus te /
analyzed: gal te de'i skad cig ni glang po che de rnyed na ji zhig de'i rjes tshol bar byed ces bya ba ni bcus te /
translated: If he finds the elephant at that moment, what is the purpose of searching for its tracks?

original: glang po che'i rkang rjes mtshon par mi dgos zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩgal te yang kha cig  tshol bar byed pa ni sbas /
analyzed: glang po che'i rkang rjes mtshon par mi dgos zhes bya ba'i don to // gal te yang kha cig  tshol bar byed pa ni sbas /
translated: The meaning is: it is not necessary to point out the elephant's footprint.

original: stong pa'i glang nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i glang nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: And if someone were to seek, the meaning is: the empty elephant itself should be seen.

original: don bshad pa ston to /üîΩsngags lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gal te rang nyid sngags kyi sku'i rnal 'byor pa /
analyzed: don bshad pa ston to / sngags lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gal te rang nyid sngags kyi sku'i rnal 'byor pa /
translated: The meaning is explained.

original: 'bras bu la sbyar bas de ltar slar yang gzhan gyi rang gi ngo bo'i dngos po rjes su 'gro zhing tshol bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //üîΩyongs su rdzogs pa nyid pas na /
analyzed: 'bras bu la sbyar bas de ltar slar yang gzhan gyi rang gi ngo bo'i dngos po rjes su 'gro zhing tshol bar byed ces bya ba'i don to // yongs su rdzogs pa nyid pas na /
translated: If one is a yogin of the mantra body, etc., the meaning is: having applied to the result, in that way again one seeks the essence of another's own nature.

original: zhib la 'thag pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: zhib la 'thag pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Because of being completely perfect, the meaning is: like weaving fine cloth.

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de bshad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩtshig le'ur byas pa gsum ston te /
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de bshad pa'i phyir ro // tshig le'ur byas pa gsum ston te /
translated: The meaning of the characteristics of engagement, etc., will be explained later is taught.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i don gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i don gzhan pa'o //
translated: The three verses are shown. The meaning of and also is another.

original: rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni skyes bu'i ming nges par bstan pa'o //üîΩgsum sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa @161a * //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni skyes bu'i ming nges par bstan pa'o // gsum sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa @161a * //
translated: The term ‚Äúvajra-holder‚Äù indicates the name of the person.

original: gsum gyi rjes su sbyor zhing ldan pa ste /
analyzed: gsum gyi rjes su sbyor zhing ldan pa ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúunited with the three‚Äù means united with, endowed with, the three: entry, and so on.üîΩThe term ‚Äúhis‚Äù refers to the vajra-holder.

original: de'i dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúsupreme‚Äù is connected with the term ‚Äúpower.‚Äù

original: sbyor ba ni rang gi gnas su so sor legs par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni rang gi gnas su so sor legs par sbyar ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnited‚Äù means well-united in their own places.

original: spyan drang ba ni dgug pa ste /
analyzed: spyan drang ba ni dgug pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSummoning‚Äù means summoning.

original: de yang gzhug pa'i sgrar brjod do //
analyzed: de yang gzhug pa'i sgrar brjod do //
translated: This is also expressed by the term ‚Äúentering.‚Äù

original: gshegs su gsol ba ni /
analyzed: gshegs su gsol ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúDismissing‚Äù means

original: myur ba ste gtong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: myur ba ste gtong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äúquickly,‚Äù that is, ‚Äúsending.‚Äù

original: gnyig ma yin pa'i sgras ni gnas pa ste gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnyig ma yin pa'i sgras ni gnas pa ste gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúneither‚Äù indicates ‚Äúabiding,‚Äù that is, ‚Äúcausing to abide.‚Äù

original: lung gzhan las yongs su mthong ba'i sgra gzhan pa 'dis 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba nyid du rab tu bstan pa ste /
analyzed: lung gzhan las yongs su mthong ba'i sgra gzhan pa 'dis 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba nyid du rab tu bstan pa ste /
translated: By this other term ‚Äúseeing,‚Äù which is different from the other term ‚Äúentering,‚Äù ‚Äúabiding,‚Äù and ‚Äúarising‚Äù are indicated.

original: 'dir sngar ma byung ba ni cung zad kyang med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir sngar ma byung ba ni cung zad kyang med pa'o //
translated: There is nothing here that was not said before.

original: 'on kyang gnyis ka ma yin pa'i sgras gang zhig gnyis las gzhan pa gsum par de brjod de bar na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang gnyis ka ma yin pa'i sgras gang zhig gnyis las gzhan pa gsum par de brjod de bar na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: However, the term ‚Äúneither‚Äù expresses a third alternative that is different from the two, because it is located in between the two.

original: gnyis ka ma yin pa lta bu ni gnyig min pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin pa lta bu ni gnyig min pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Neither‚Äù is like ‚Äúnot both.‚Äù

original: ci ltar grang ba las 'das pa'i dus sa las rlangs pa byung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang sngags kyi yi ge rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin du nges par sbyor bas bsgom pa rab tu gsal bar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la yang drod rab tu
analyzed: ci ltar grang ba las 'das pa'i dus sa las rlangs pa byung ba de bzhin du 'dir yang sngags kyi yi ge rnams gnas ji lta ba bzhin du nges par sbyor bas bsgom pa rab tu gsal bar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la yang drod rab tu
translated: Just as steam arises from the earth when it is heated, in the same way, for yogins who are cultivating the clear manifestation of the mantra syllables by applying them in the proper places, heat arises.

original: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: grub ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: grub ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú Accomplishment‚Äù is the attainment of the desired result.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: sna tshogs gnas pa ni sna tshogs gnas te /
analyzed: sna tshogs gnas pa ni sna tshogs gnas te /
translated: ‚Äú Abiding in diversity‚Äù is abiding in diversity.

original: las thams cad byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: las thams cad byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means ‚Äúperforming all actions.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyis bla na med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis bla na med pa ste /
translated: It is ‚Äúunsurpassed‚Äù by that very fact.

original: sems can gyi 'dod pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs pa yongs su skong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'dod pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs pa yongs su skong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it fulfills the various desires of sentient beings.

original: dro ba thob nas rang gi sems la thog mar sngags nges par sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba ston te /
analyzed: dro ba thob nas rang gi sems la thog mar sngags nges par sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba ston te /
translated: Having attained heat, one should first apply the mantra to one's own mind.

original: myur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la myur ba ni ldang ba'o //
analyzed: myur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la myur ba ni ldang ba'o //
translated: Quick and so on. Quick is rising,

original: rnam par sdud pa ni rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par sdud pa ni rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: gathering is entering,

original: dal ba can ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dal ba can ni gnas pa'o //
translated: slow is abiding.

original: sngags kyi yi ge gsum nges par sbyor ba sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi yi ge gsum nges par sbyor ba sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: One should meditate on the application of the three mantra syllables.

original: sngad ba ni sngags kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: sngad ba ni sngags kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: Previously is the practice of the mantra.

original: de yang bsgom pas sbyor bar 'gyur te de ma thag tu slob ma'i rna drung du bla mas gang zhig 'di ltar bstan par gyur nas 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang bsgom pas sbyor bar 'gyur te de ma thag tu slob ma'i rna drung du bla mas gang zhig 'di ltar bstan par gyur nas 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that will be applied through meditation. Immediately, near the ear of the disciple, whatever is taught by the guru will arise as the result.

original: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni slob mas gsol ba gdab pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni slob mas gsol ba gdab pa'o //
translated: With effort is the request of the disciple.

original: 'di bla ma dang slob ma gnyis kyis bshad pa gnyis @161b byed pa'i tshig ni med par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di bla ma dang slob ma gnyis kyis bshad pa gnyis @161b byed pa'i tshig ni med par blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is to be seen as the words of both the teacher and the disciple.

original: da ni tshig le'ur byas pa drug gi phan yon dang sngags btu ba dang / bzlas pa'i grangs kyang ston te /
analyzed: da ni tshig le'ur byas pa drug gi phan yon dang sngags btu ba dang / bzlas pa'i grangs kyang ston te /
translated: Now, the benefits of the six-chaptered [tantra], the extraction of the mantra, and the number of recitations are taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngags btu ba ston pa'i don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngags btu ba ston pa'i don to //
translated: The word then has the meaning of teaching the extraction of the mantra.

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni rnal 'byor gyi spyi gtsug gi nor bu'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni rnal 'byor gyi spyi gtsug gi nor bu'o //
translated: The lord of yogins is the crest-jewel of the yogin.

original: de rnams dang 'brel pa gsang ba'i yi ge rab tu bshad pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de rnams dang 'brel pa gsang ba'i yi ge rab tu bshad pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: That is connected with those, and it is to be fully explained as the secret syllable.

original: mi bstan pa nyid kyis na gsang ba'o //
analyzed: mi bstan pa nyid kyis na gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is not taught.

original: yang na 'dis lha'i de kho na nyid gsang bas na gsang ba'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dis lha'i de kho na nyid gsang bas na gsang ba'o //
translated: Or, it is secret because the reality of the deity is concealed by this.

original: gsang ba yang yin la yi ge yang yin las na gsang ba'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: gsang ba yang yin la yi ge yang yin las na gsang ba'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is both secret and a syllable, thus it is a secret syllable.

original: de 'gro ba dam pa la brten nas rab tu bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de 'gro ba dam pa la brten nas rab tu bshad pa ste /
translated: That is fully explained in dependence on the highest being.

original: bstan par bya ba'o zhes rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'o zhes rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
translated: Vajradhara has said.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: thabs kyi dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thabs kyi dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, the best method, etc.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs pas so ;
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs pas so ;
translated: By means of supramundane logic.

original: / rab tu bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: / rab tu bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar bya ba'o //
translated: In order to demonstrate, means in order to make clear.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is it like?

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Yoga means the samadhi of deity yoga.

original: de'i dngos grub mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: Its siddhi is the perfection.

original: 'bras bu ni de nyid rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de nyid rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The result is the completion of that,

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
translated: the siddhi of the great seal.

original: rnam pa de gnyis rab tu bstan pas ster zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de gnyis rab tu bstan pas ster zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o //
translated: By demonstrating those two, it bestows, means it bestows the result of the siddhi of yoga.

original: gang gi bsams pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub ma gtogs pa bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi bsams pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub ma gtogs pa bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By mere thought, means by mere repetition, except for the siddhi of yoga.

original: rnal 'byor pas mchog ster bar nus par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas mchog ster bar nus par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The yogi is able to bestow the supreme.

original: mchog ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: The best is the one most desired.

original: rig sngags 'chang la sogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang la sogs pa nyid do //
translated: It is the state of being a knowledge-mantra bearer, etc.

original: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The first, etc.

original: 'dir dang po'i yi ge ni aom mo //
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i yi ge ni aom mo //
translated: Here, the first letter is Om.

original: de sngags du ma'i thog mar mthong ba nyid pas na /
analyzed: de sngags du ma'i thog mar mthong ba nyid pas na /
translated: Since it is seen at the beginning of many mantras,

original: de'i sbyor bas rim gyis rjod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes sbyor ro //
analyzed: de'i sbyor bas rim gyis rjod par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes sbyor ro //
translated: the yogi/nƒ´ who gradually recites it by its application is connected.

original: de ci zhig byed ce na /üîΩdbugs rdub  par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de ci zhig byed ce na / dbugs rdub  par byed pa ste /
translated: What does he do?üîΩHe inhales,

original: rlung gyen du rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: rlung gyen du rgyu ba'o //
translated: that is, he draws up the wind.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
translated: Constantly means in the context of meditation.

original: brgyad pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni yi ge ha'o //üîΩldan pa ni yi ge au ste 'dres par gyur ces bya @162a * //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni yi ge ha'o // ldan pa ni yi ge au ste 'dres par gyur ces bya @162a * //
translated: The end of the eighth is the letter Ha.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: Endowed with means the letter U, which has the meaning of ‚Äúmixed together. ‚Äù

original: ha'i steng gi thig le dang bcas par ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bya ba'o //
analyzed: ha'i steng gi thig le dang bcas par ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bya ba'o //
translated: The drop above the Ha is to be added, just as it is.

original: h'um zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: Hum is the condensed meaning.

original: dbugs dbyung ba ni rlung phyir rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: dbugs dbyung ba ni rlung phyir rgyu ba'o //
translated: Exhaling is the wind moving out.

original: 'dir aom gyi tshad ni thal mo brdabs pa phyed dang gnyis so //
analyzed: 'dir aom gyi tshad ni thal mo brdabs pa phyed dang gnyis so //
translated: Here, the measure of the syllable OM is one and a half finger-widths.

original: thugs kyi sa bon gyi tshad ni thal mo brdabs pa phyed dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi sa bon gyi tshad ni thal mo brdabs pa phyed dang bzhi'o //
translated: The measure of the seed-syllable of the mind is four finger-widths.

original: 'dir ni man ngag go //
analyzed: 'dir ni man ngag go //
translated: Here, this is the instruction.

original: aom gyi don ni yi ge tsam mo //
analyzed: aom gyi don ni yi ge tsam mo //
translated: The meaning of the syllable OM is merely the syllable.

original: yi ge aom ni ye shes kyi snying po zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan pas so //
analyzed: yi ge aom ni ye shes kyi snying po zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan pas so //
translated: The syllable OM is taught in the Root Tantra as the essence of wisdom.

original: snang ba med pa gnyis kyis sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid h'um gi don to //
analyzed: snang ba med pa gnyis kyis sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid h'um gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the syllable HUM is the equality of body, speech, and mind, which is taught in the Root Tantra as the non-appearance of the two.

original: yi ge h'um ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pas 'thad pa zhes de nyid las bstan to //
analyzed: yi ge h'um ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pas 'thad pa zhes de nyid las bstan to //
translated: The syllable HUM is taught in the Root Tantra as the reasonable, because it is indivisible like the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: de bas na yi ge aom bstan pas ni dbugs dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na yi ge aom bstan pas ni dbugs dbyung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the teaching of the syllable OM is exhalation.üîΩThe teaching of the syllable HUM is inhalation.

original: yi ge h'um bstan pas ni dbugs rdub  pa ste sems tsam du bstan par bya zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to ;
analyzed: yi ge h'um bstan pas ni dbugs rdub  pa ste sems tsam du bstan par bya zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to ;
translated: The concise meaning is that one should teach the mind only.

original: /'dir yi ge gsum bsgom pa rab tu brtson pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: /'dir yi ge gsum bsgom pa rab tu brtson pa ma yin nam /
translated: Here, is it not the case that one who is diligent in the meditation on the three syllables

original: ci ltar rnam pa gnyis pa de btu zhing gsum pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar rnam pa gnyis pa de btu zhing gsum pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is the second part to be extracted, and not the third?

original: smras pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / rdub  pa gnyis yongs su ma gtogs pa gzhan phyogs gsum pa ni yod pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: smras pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / rdub  pa gnyis yongs su ma gtogs pa gzhan phyogs gsum pa ni yod pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is said: apart from the two, exhalation and inhalation, there is no third part.

original: gang zhig gsum pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang zhig gsum pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of establishing the third,

original: yi ge a'a: rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge a'a: rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the letter A is applied.

original: de bas na aom dang h'um gnyis po dag dgod pas na /
analyzed: de bas na aom dang h'um gnyis po dag dgod pas na /
translated: Therefore, by the arrangement of the two, O and Hum,

original: de dag nyid btu bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid btu bar bya ba ste /
translated: those two are to be extracted.

original: de dag ni gtso bo'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gtso bo'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'o //
translated: They are taught to be the nature of the principal.

original: gsum pa yi ge aa ni ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gsum pa yi ge aa ni ma yin pa ste /
translated: The third, the letter A, is not,

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it is purposeless.

original: / yi ge aa yang gnas par 'gyur ba la 'jug par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: / yi ge aa yang gnas par 'gyur ba la 'jug par bsam par bya'o //
translated: The letter A should be conceived as entering into the abiding.

original: de yang thal mo brdabs pa phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
analyzed: de yang thal mo brdabs pa phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad do //
translated: It is the measure of one and a half claps.

original: ci dga' ba'i bzlas pa zhes bya ba yang de nyid la bya ste /
analyzed: ci dga' ba'i bzlas pa zhes bya ba yang de nyid la bya ste /
translated: Also, the recitation as one wishes is just that.

original: rang mos pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: rang mos pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i bzlas pa ste /
translated: It is the recitation that follows one's own inclination.

original: khri phrag gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: khri phrag gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Two myriads, etc.

original: stong phrag nyi shu la ni khri phrag gnyis so //
analyzed: stong phrag nyi shu la ni khri phrag gnyis so //
translated: Twenty thousand is two myriads.

original: yang stong phrag gcig dang / brgya phrag drug go //
analyzed: yang stong phrag gcig dang / brgya phrag drug go //
translated: And one thousand, and six hundred.

original: gcig tu bgrangs nas stong phrag nyi shu gcig dang brgya phrag drug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig tu bgrangs nas stong phrag nyi shu gcig dang brgya phrag drug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Counting them together, they are eleven thousand and six hundred.

original: nyin mtshan zhes bya ba ni nyin dang mtshan du bzlas pa'i @162b grangs byed pa ste /
analyzed: nyin mtshan zhes bya ba ni nyin dang mtshan du bzlas pa'i @162b grangs byed pa ste /
translated: Day and night is the number of repetitions in the day and night.

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni sems mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni sems mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The lord of yoga is one whose mind is in equipoise.

original: de 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: He should desire, etc.

original: sems can skal ba can gang su zhig ste /
analyzed: sems can skal ba can gang su zhig ste /
translated: Any fortunate sentient being

original: gsang ba'i dgongs pa ni dgongs pa lung bstan pa la sogs par gnas pa'i phra mo'i sbyor ba bdag nyid la gsal bar shes par bya ba'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dgongs pa ni dgongs pa lung bstan pa la sogs par gnas pa'i phra mo'i sbyor ba bdag nyid la gsal bar shes par bya ba'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The secret intention is the desire to make clear to oneself the subtle yoga that abides in the Tantra of the Super-Transcendent, etc.

original: de'i rdo rje bzlas pa de nyid dang por bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rdo rje bzlas pa de nyid dang por bstan par bya ste /
translated: That very vajra repetition of his should be taught first.

original: de nyid kyi rim pas phra mo'i sbyor ba thob ces bya ba yang tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rim pas phra mo'i sbyor ba thob ces bya ba yang tshig gi don to //
translated: The phrase having attained the subtle yoga by that very process is also a word-meaning.

original: ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
translated: The phrase concentration, etc.

original: yid nang du bsdus pas na bsam gtan no //
analyzed: yid nang du bsdus pas na bsam gtan no //
translated: Concentration is the withdrawal of the mind inward.

original: klog pa ni des skyo ba na de'i rjes su mthun pa'i mdo klog pa ste de dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: klog pa ni des skyo ba na de'i rjes su mthun pa'i mdo klog pa ste de dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Reading is the reading of a sutra that is suitable for that, when one is tired of that. One should be endowed with those.

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni phan yon no //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni phan yon no //
translated: The phrase by that is a benefit.

original: las rnams zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: las rnams zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ritual actions means the collection of ritual actions such as pacification, etc.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba ste /
translated: The phrase illusion-like concentration means seeing things as they really are.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mthong ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mthong ba'o //
translated: It is seeing the nature of non-existence.

original: de bas na tshig le'ur byas pa brgyad kyis sngar bshad cing bsgrub pa'i don lung gzhan gyis gsal bar ston te /
analyzed: de bas na tshig le'ur byas pa brgyad kyis sngar bshad cing bsgrub pa'i don lung gzhan gyis gsal bar ston te /
translated: Therefore, the eight verses clarify the meaning that was previously explained and established by other scriptures.

original: gnyis su med par zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rgyal bar byed pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med par zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rgyal bar byed pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: Non-dual means the wisdom of equality, which is victorious.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de nyid kyis na rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud de /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud de /
translated: Therefore, it is a great yoga tantra.

original: der bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: der bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: It was spoken by the Blessed One Vajradhara.

original: bzlas nas su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bzlas nas su zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having recited the mantra, etc.

original: bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can ni bsgrub pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can ni bsgrub pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The one who is of the nature of practice is the practitioner who has reached the end of practice.

original: gsang sngags bzlas nas zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags bzlas pa byas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags bzlas nas zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags bzlas pa byas pa'o //
translated: Having recited the mantra means having performed the mantra recitation.

original: mnyam med ces bya ba ni brtson pa dang bcas shing nus pa dang bcas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mnyam med ces bya ba ni brtson pa dang bcas shing nus pa dang bcas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Unequalled means with effort and with ability, this is the meaning.

original: ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhe na khams gsum ste /
analyzed: ci zhig bsgrub par bya zhe na khams gsum ste /
translated: What is to be accomplished? The three realms.

original: sa gsum dbang du bya ba nyid ni der gnas pa'i 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'o //
analyzed: sa gsum dbang du bya ba nyid ni der gnas pa'i 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'o //
translated: Subjugating the three worlds means subjugating the beings who dwell there.

original: de yang 'dir gsang sngags bsgrub par som nyi med pa ste /
analyzed: de yang 'dir gsang sngags bsgrub par som nyi med pa ste /
translated: Moreover, here, there is no doubt about the accomplishment of the mantra.

original: de la gzhol ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de la gzhol ba nyid kyis so //
translated: By being devoted to that,

original: zla ba gcig gis zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste de bas na gnyis @163a * //üîΩsam gsum mam /
analyzed: zla ba gcig gis zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste de bas na gnyis @163a * // sam gsum mam /
translated: one month is a mere illustration, therefore, two, three,

original: drug gam lo gcig gis zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: drug gam lo gcig gis zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: six, or even one year.

original: yang na khams gsum dang sku gsung thugs ni dbyer med par nye bar gdags par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na khams gsum dang sku gsung thugs ni dbyer med par nye bar gdags par bya ste /
translated: Or else, the three realms and the body, speech, and mind are to be designated as inseparable.

original: de dag gang gi dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag gang gi dbang du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of in whose power? is interpretable.

original: 'bum phrag drug ldan zhes bya ba ni stong phrag bcu la khri phrag gcig / khri phrag bcu la 'bum phrag gcig ste /
analyzed: 'bum phrag drug ldan zhes bya ba ni stong phrag bcu la khri phrag gcig / khri phrag bcu la 'bum phrag gcig ste /
translated: Possessing six hundred thousand means that ten thousand is one hundred thousand, and ten hundred thousand is one million.

original: de tsam grangs 'bum phrag drug tu bcad pa'i tshad du sngags pas /
analyzed: de tsam grangs 'bum phrag drug tu bcad pa'i tshad du sngags pas /
translated: The mantra practitioner should divide that into six hundred thousand parts.

original: gsang sngags bzlas na zla ba yar gyi ngo'i nya la 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: gsang sngags bzlas na zla ba yar gyi ngo'i nya la 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: If the mantra is recited, it will be accomplished on the full moon of the waxing fortnight. This is the meaning of the words.

original: ci zhig byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas she na /
translated: What is done?

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dang por phyag byas shing mnyes par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dang por phyag byas shing mnyes par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: Having first paid homage to and pleased the Blessed One, Vajrasattva.

original: gsang sngags ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gsang sngags ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of mantra?

original: gang rnam par shes pa las byung zhing skyes pa de la de skad du bstan te /
analyzed: gang rnam par shes pa las byung zhing skyes pa de la de skad du bstan te /
translated: That which arises from consciousness is taught as such.

original: sems las kun du byung ba'i sngags rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems las kun du byung ba'i sngags rnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: mantras that arise from the mind.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Regarding there, and so on,

original: de la zhes bya ba ni sngags la gzhol ba'i sngags pa ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni sngags la gzhol ba'i sngags pa ste /
translated: there means in the mantra, for one devoted to mantra.

original: brtul zhugs ni mi smra ba dang / langs te gnas pa dang slong ba la sogs pa la sdom pa'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs ni mi smra ba dang / langs te gnas pa dang slong ba la sogs pa la sdom pa'o //
translated: Vow means the restraint of silence, standing, begging, and so on.

original: phreng ba ni grangs 'dzin par byed pa'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: phreng ba ni grangs 'dzin par byed pa'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Garland means the garland for counting recitations.

original: dgag pa dang gzung ba ni srog gi rlung dag ste sbyin sreg ni me'i mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: dgag pa dang gzung ba ni srog gi rlung dag ste sbyin sreg ni me'i mchod sbyin no //
translated: Stopping and holding refer to the life-force winds. Fire offering means the fire sacrifice.

original: las rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Actions are pacification and so on.

original: de dag thams cad la ldog pa ni nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad la ldog pa ni nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: All of those are stopped, meaning they are pacified.

original: gcig nas gcig tu zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi las de dag las kyang ldog pa ste /
analyzed: gcig nas gcig tu zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi las de dag las kyang ldog pa ste /
translated: From one to another means that one should turn away from those external actions.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par g-yeng ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyis na mi 'thang pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par g-yeng ba skyed par byed pa nyid kyis na mi 'thang pa'o //
translated: Because they generate distraction, they are not suitable.

original: gang nam zhig gi tshe mi 'thad pa de 'dir 'dul ba'i skye bo'i don du bya ba 'byung ba de'i tshe /üîΩsnying rje chen pos dmigs nas bya //
analyzed: gang nam zhig gi tshe mi 'thad pa de 'dir 'dul ba'i skye bo'i don du bya ba 'byung ba de'i tshe / snying rje chen pos dmigs nas bya //
translated: When they are not suitable, then at that time, for the sake of the disciples, the arising of the purpose is taught.

original: zhes ston to /
analyzed: zhes ston to /
translated: One should focus on great compassion and do it.

original: ya'i don gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ya'i don gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The meaning of ya and so on is as follows.

original: ya'i don ni yongs su gyur pa'i ngo bo rlung gi dkyil 'khor te de yid la rnam par bsam par bya zhing /
analyzed: ya'i don ni yongs su gyur pa'i ngo bo rlung gi dkyil 'khor te de yid la rnam par bsam par bya zhing /
translated: The meaning of ya is the nature of transformation, the ma·πá·∏çala of wind, which should be imagined in the mind.

original: sa bon bzhi'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis gang cung zad zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rgyas par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sa bon bzhi'i bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis gang cung zad zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rgyas par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The cultivation of the four seed syllables precedes the expansion of any pacifying and so on.

original: gang gis she na @163b dngos grub 'dod pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gis she na @163b dngos grub 'dod pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By whom? By one who desires power

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: means by one who accomplishes the desired result, is the meaning.

original: ra la sogs pa gsum ni /
analyzed: ra la sogs pa gsum ni /
translated: The three beginning with ra are

original: ra dang / la dang / wa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: ra dang / la dang / wa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: the characteristics of ra, la, and va.

original: de ltar gyur pa yin na 'gro ba'i don bya ba rgya cher rab tu 'jug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa yin na 'gro ba'i don bya ba rgya cher rab tu 'jug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
translated: If it is so, then it is the meaning of the statement, ‚Äúone enters into the vast benefit of beings.‚Äù

original: / de dag ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
analyzed: / de dag ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
translated: How should they be cultivated?

original: me dang rlung dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum ste /
analyzed: me dang rlung dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum ste /
translated: The three beginning with ‚Äúfire and wind‚Äù are

original: me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi pa der thun phyed phyed kyi dus su gnas pa ste /
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi pa der thun phyed phyed kyi dus su gnas pa ste /
translated: the four ma·πá·∏çalas of fire and so forth, abiding in half a period,

original: gnas pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa thob pa'o //
translated: that is, attaining stability.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: las ni zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las su sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: las ni zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las su sgrub pa ste /
translated: The action is the accomplishment of the action of pacification and so forth.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gang gi tshe sngags pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las sgrub pa la gzhol bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sngags pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las sgrub pa la gzhol bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the mantrin is intent on accomplishing the action of pacification and so forth,

original: de'i sems mnyam par gzhag pas rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor re re thun phyed phyed du rlung gi rgyu ba nye bar dmigs zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i sems mnyam par gzhag pas rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor re re thun phyed phyed du rlung gi rgyu ba nye bar dmigs zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: then, by his mind being in equipoise, the movement of the wind in each of the ma·πá·∏çalas of wind and so forth is observed for half a period. This is the summarized meaning.

original: gnyis gnyis zhes bya ba ni lan gnyis gnyis te /
analyzed: gnyis gnyis zhes bya ba ni lan gnyis gnyis te /
translated: ‚ÄúTwo by two‚Äù means twice.

original: so so'i dkyil 'khor du nyin mtshan phyed par kun du rgyu bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: so so'i dkyil 'khor du nyin mtshan phyed par kun du rgyu bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the movement is half a day and night in each ma·πá·∏çala.

original: slar yang ldog pas de ltar rlung gi rgyu ba nyin mtshan gnyis nas bcu drug tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang ldog pas de ltar rlung gi rgyu ba nyin mtshan gnyis nas bcu drug tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Again, it turns back. Thus, the movement of the wind is from two to sixteen days and nights.

original: yang na gnyis gnyis zhes bya ba ni zlos pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: yang na gnyis gnyis zhes bya ba ni zlos pa'i tshig ste /
translated: Or, ‚Äútwo by two‚Äù is a reduplication.

original: las rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: las rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: There are four kinds of action.

original: de'i dbang du byas nas bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dbang du byas nas bsgom par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: With respect to that, one should practice, is the meaning.

original: de nyid kyi las bzhi la rab tu sbyar bar bya zhes kha cig  smra ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi las bzhi la rab tu sbyar bar bya zhes kha cig  smra ste /
translated: Some say that one should apply it to the four actions.

original: de yang skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: de yang skyon med pa'o //
translated: That is also faultless.

original: mchod la zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa gang zhig mchod pa la brtson pa de gzhan gyis mchod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mchod la zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa gang zhig mchod pa la brtson pa de gzhan gyis mchod par 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúWorship‚Äù means that any yogin who is devoted to worship will be worshipped by others.

original: gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mchod par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mchod par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Wherever he goes, he will be worshipped, is the meaning.

original: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúRecitation‚Äù means being free from and purified of the obscurations of body, speech, and mind through recitation and so forth.

original: me la zhes bya ba ni me la mchod pa la brtson pas 'byor par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: me la zhes bya ba ni me la mchod pa la brtson pas 'byor par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFire‚Äù means that one will become prosperous through being diligent in making offerings to the fire.

original: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan la lhag par gnas pas kyang mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
analyzed: bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan la lhag par gnas pas kyang mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
translated: ‚ÄúMeditation‚Äù means that one will attain nirvƒÅ·πáa through abiding in meditation. This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ltar shes nas zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa 'dis rang gi ngo bo @164a * //
analyzed: de ltar shes nas zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa 'dis rang gi ngo bo @164a * //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving understood thus‚Äù means that the yogin who has attained his own nature in this way

original: thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'gro ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i 'gro ba'i tshogs byis pa bzhin du mthong ba ste /
analyzed: thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'gro ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i 'gro ba'i tshogs byis pa bzhin du mthong ba ste /
translated: sees the assembly of beings belonging to the three worlds like a child.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ltar srid pa'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bag chags kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ltar srid pa'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Like a child, he wanders in the wheel of existence through the power of the latent tendencies of virtue and nonvirtue.

original: de bas na de'i mod la sngags pas 'di'i gsang sngags 'grub ste /
analyzed: de bas na de'i mod la sngags pas 'di'i gsang sngags 'grub ste /
translated: Therefore, at that very moment, the mantra practitioner‚Äôs mantra will be accomplished.

original: 'bras bu ster bar nus par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ster bar nus par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: is able to bestow the result.

original: ji lta bus she na /
analyzed: ji lta bus she na /
translated: By what kind?

original: mi rtog chos can zhes bya ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: mi rtog chos can zhes bya ba rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'thob pa ste /
translated: The state of non-conceptuality, i.e., the attainment of the reality of non-conceptuality.

original: de yang sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsal ba ni gsung rdo rje bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med sgrub cing rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de yang sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsal ba ni gsung rdo rje bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med sgrub cing rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Moreover, the illumination of the reality of mantra is the cause of accomplishing and perfecting the Bhagavat VƒÅgƒ´≈õvara AmitƒÅbha.

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid de yang sems tsam la nges par sbyar zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid de yang sems tsam la nges par sbyar zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: And that reality of mantra is definitely applied to mere mind.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba thams cad spangs pa'i sems 'ba' zhig ni sems tsam mo //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba thams cad spangs pa'i sems 'ba' zhig ni sems tsam mo //
translated: Mere mind is the mind alone, which is devoid of the net of conceptualization.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: ye shes gsum gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By the three intuitions.

original: snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum gyis bye brag gi rigs pas so //
analyzed: snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum gyis bye brag gi rigs pas so //
translated: By the reasoning of the distinctions of the three intuitions, such as the intuition of appearance, etc.

original: de ni snod dang snod ma yin pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis ston te /üîΩbla ma brnyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ni snod dang snod ma yin pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis ston te / bla ma brnyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: That is taught by two verses, on the vessel and non-vessel.üîΩDespising the guru, etc.

original: bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen brnyas shing ;
analyzed: bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen brnyas shing ;
translated: means despising the guru, the spiritual friend,

original: smod pa'i tshig gang la yod pa de la de skad du brjod do //
analyzed: smod pa'i tshig gang la yod pa de la de skad du brjod do //
translated: He who has the words of contempt is so called.

original: g-yon can ni drang po ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon can ni drang po ma yin pa'o //
translated: The deceitful one is not straightforward.

original: dad pa med pa ni ma dad pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa med pa ni ma dad pa'o //
translated: The faithless one is without faith.

original: gsang sngags klags pa tsam gyis kyang rlom pa ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags klags pa tsam gyis kyang rlom pa ste /
translated: He is proud even by just reading the mantra.

original: glegs bam mthong bas khengs shing mngon par nga rgyal ba ni glegs bam ma mthong bas khengs pa'o //
analyzed: glegs bam mthong bas khengs shing mngon par nga rgyal ba ni glegs bam ma mthong bas khengs pa'o //
translated: He is proud by seeing the book, and is arrogant.

original: gzhan gyis cung zad legs par bshad cing bstan pa de la yang dad cing nyams su len par mi byed pa de ni dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis cung zad legs par bshad cing bstan pa de la yang dad cing nyams su len par mi byed pa de ni dad pa med pa'o //
translated: He is faithless, because he does not have faith in and practice what others explain and teach well.

original: dbang bskur ba ma thob par dbang bskur ba thob po zhes brjod pa ni dbang bskur dman pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ma thob par dbang bskur ba thob po zhes brjod pa ni dbang bskur dman pa'o //
translated: He is of low consecration, because he says he has received consecration when he has not.

original: sems de lta bu'i skyon du mas gos pa'i slob ma dman pa 'di la sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi gtam yang mi brjod pa ste /
analyzed: sems de lta bu'i skyon du mas gos pa'i slob ma dman pa 'di la sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi gtam yang mi brjod pa ste /
translated: This inferior disciple, whose mind is thus covered by many faults, should not be told even the story of the characteristics of the reality of the mantra.

original: gtam tsam yang bsnyad par mi bya zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gtam tsam yang bsnyad par mi bya zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that he should not even be told the story.

original: gang zhig dad pa dang ldan pa ni shin tu nyung ba'i chos shig bstan pa na yang de bzhin du 'dzin @164b te ;
analyzed: gang zhig dad pa dang ldan pa ni shin tu nyung ba'i chos shig bstan pa na yang de bzhin du 'dzin @164b te ;
translated: One who is endowed with faith is a person who, even when taught a very brief teaching, grasps it as it is.

original: bla ma la gus pa dang yid bsnyen bkur la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma la gus pa dang yid bsnyen bkur la brtson pa'o //
translated: He is respectful to the guru and is diligent in serving him.

original: nyan 'dod pa ni nyan pa la gus pa ste /
analyzed: nyan 'dod pa ni nyan pa la gus pa ste /
translated: One who desires to listen is respectful to the one who is teaching.

original: de la rtag tu mngon par brtson zhing 'bad pa'o //
analyzed: de la rtag tu mngon par brtson zhing 'bad pa'o //
translated: He is always diligent and persevering in that.

original: thos pa 'dzin par byed cing 'dis mi gtong bas na thos pa 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: thos pa 'dzin par byed cing 'dis mi gtong bas na thos pa 'dzin pa ste /
translated: He is one who retains what he hears and does not let it go.

original: bla mas bshad pa'i tshig zur tsam gyis rtogs shing khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: bla mas bshad pa'i tshig zur tsam gyis rtogs shing khong du chud pa ste /
translated: He understands and comprehends just by hearing the words of the guru.

original: phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúretains‚Äù is that he does so by first paying homage.

original: de lta bu de bla ma dam pas brtag mi dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu de bla ma dam pas brtag mi dgos pa'o //
translated: Such a person does not need to be examined by the excellent guru.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúJust that‚Äù is a restrictive term.

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'di ni brtag pa'i gnas ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'di ni brtag pa'i gnas ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means that in every way, he is not a candidate for examination.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni bla ma chen po'i bka' drin ni rjes su gzung ba'i gnas bzhi'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni bla ma chen po'i bka' drin ni rjes su gzung ba'i gnas bzhi'am /
translated: For this is the fourfold basis of being taken care of by the grace of the great Guru.

original: yang na ni 'dir bla ma la dad pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ni 'dir bla ma la dad pa'o //
translated: Or else, here it is faith in the Guru.

original: dpe bshad cing bstan te /
analyzed: dpe bshad cing bstan te /
translated: The example is explained and taught.

original: ri dbang rtse nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ri dbang rtse nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: From the peak of the lord of mountains, etc.

original: 'di ltar kha cig  ri rab kyi rtse mor bag med par spyod pas lhung ba lhung bar mi bya'o snyam sems na yang lhung ba de nyid de /
analyzed: 'di ltar kha cig  ri rab kyi rtse mor bag med par spyod pas lhung ba lhung bar mi bya'o snyam sems na yang lhung ba de nyid de /
translated: Thus, if someone thinks, I will not fall by being heedless on the peak of Mount Meru, even though that is so, that fall is inevitable.

original: 'dir ni 'dzin par byed pa ma mthong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'dzin par byed pa ma mthong ba'o //
translated: Here, the one who causes it to be grasped is not seen.

original: gal te yang kha cig  ri rab kyi rked du chags par 'gyur ba yang srid do zhes smra ba na /
analyzed: gal te yang kha cig  ri rab kyi rked du chags par 'gyur ba yang srid do zhes smra ba na /
translated: If someone says, It is also possible to be attached to the middle of Mount Meru,

original: de lta mod kyi lhung ba ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi lhung ba ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: that is so, but the fall is the result.

original: 'dir som nyi med pa'i dpe zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir som nyi med pa'i dpe zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, it is the example of no doubt.

original: 'dir don bstan te bla ma'i drin gyis zhes bya ba bla ma'i drin gyis man ngag thob pa'i mtshan nyid can de la de skad du bstan to //
analyzed: 'dir don bstan te bla ma'i drin gyis zhes bya ba bla ma'i drin gyis man ngag thob pa'i mtshan nyid can de la de skad du bstan to //
translated: Here, the meaning is taught: by the grace of the Guru, etc. By the grace of the Guru, the one who obtains the intimate instruction is characterized by that, and it is taught like that.

original: gang zhig grol ba ni thar pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: gang zhig grol ba ni thar pa'i lam ste /
translated: The one who is liberated is the path of liberation.

original: grol bar mi 'dod kyang 'dir bla ma'i drin gyi stobs kyis grol ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'o //üîΩrim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: grol bar mi 'dod kyang 'dir bla ma'i drin gyi stobs kyis grol ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'o // rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje bzlas pa ste /
translated: Even though one does not desire liberation, here, by the power of the guru's grace, one becomes a candidate for liberation.

original: rim pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: rim pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This concludes the first chapter, on vajra repetition, from the commentary on the Five Stages called Illuminating Lamp.

original: // / de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa yan lag thams cad rab tu bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa yan lag thams cad rab tu bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having fully taught the stage of vajra repetition with all its branches,

original: da ni gnyis ba sems la dmigs pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid ston te /
analyzed: da ni gnyis ba sems la dmigs pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid ston te /
translated: now, the second, the characteristic of mere observation of mind is taught.

original: phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Homage and so forth.

original: 'dir phyag 'tshal ba rnam pa drug gi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang / rigs drug pa gtso bo nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje @165a * //üîΩ'chang nyid la bstod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyag 'tshal ba rnam pa drug gi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir dang / rigs drug pa gtso bo nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje @165a * // 'chang nyid la bstod pa'o //
translated: Here, the six types of homage are praised because of the nature of the five tathagatas, and because of being the chief of the six families, the Bhagavan Vajradhara himself is praised.

original: ci ltar bstod cing zhes bya ba la bstod par 'os pa spyan drang ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar bstod cing zhes bya ba la bstod par 'os pa spyan drang ba'o //
translated: How is he praised? The praiseworthy is invited.

original: sgra'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: sgra'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kyis //
translated: by the nature of the entity of sound.

original: zhes bstod pa dang / gar la gang gis bstod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhes bstod pa dang / gar la gang gis bstod par 'gyur te /
translated: And how can one praise the dance?

original: gang gis kyang gsum po rjes su mi dmigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gis kyang gsum po rjes su mi dmigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: By no one at all, because the three are not apprehended, is what is meant.

original: rjes su mi dmigs pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rjes su mi dmigs pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that non-apprehension, he says,

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: just as water in water, etc.

original: ji ltar chu la chu dang dang mar la mar bzhag pa ni 'dres shing bye brag med par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar chu la chu dang dang mar la mar bzhag pa ni 'dres shing bye brag med par gyur pa ste /
translated: Just as water in water, and butter in butter, is mixed and becomes undifferentiated,

original: bye brag tu shes pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag tu shes pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: and is not known as differentiated.

original: de bzhin du rang gi ye shes rang nyid kyis mthong ba ni 'dir phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra'i don to //üîΩgsum rjes su dmigs pas ye shes kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi ye shes rang nyid kyis mthong ba ni 'dir phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra'i don to // gsum rjes su dmigs pas ye shes kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes /
translated: In just the same way, one's own intuition is seen by itself. This is the meaning of the word homage here.

original: kha cig  dogs par 'gyur ba de bsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: kha cig  dogs par 'gyur ba de bsal ba'i phyir //
translated: Some may fear that if the three are not apprehended, intuition also will not exist.üîΩIn order to dispel that, he says,

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: but, etc.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dri ba dang sdud pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dri ba dang sdud pa'i don to //
translated: The word but has the sense of a question and a summary.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The second part is the entry into the two aspects.
