original: thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad blo'i yul du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad blo'i yul du gyur pa'o //
translated: All means all that is the object of the mind.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su mthun pa tshad mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su mthun pa tshad mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa ste /
translated: That which is the valid cognition that is in accord with omniscience is the attainment of omniscience.

original: tshad ma'i skyes bu sngon gyi slob dpon no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i skyes bu sngon gyi slob dpon no //
translated: The valid person is the former master.

original: de med par ye shes de mi 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: de med par ye shes de mi 'thob pa ste /
translated: Without him, that knowledge is not attained.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: mun nag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mun nag ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Darkness, etc.

original: ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo'i mig nyams par byas pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rab rib kyis blo'i mig nyams par byas pa'o //
translated: The eye of the mind is impaired by the cataract of nescience.

original: de bas na rin po che lta bu'i bsam pa bzang po gang zag kha cig  la drin gyis zhes bya ba bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na rin po che lta bu'i bsam pa bzang po gang zag kha cig  la drin gyis zhes bya ba bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba las byung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the jewel-like good thought is the kindness of some person. By means that it arises from the service to the guru.

original: snang ba ni ye shes kyi snang ba thob par gyur ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba ni ye shes kyi snang ba thob par gyur ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Light means the attainment of the light of knowledge. This is the meaning of is attained.

original: de 'dis rab tu ston te /
analyzed: de 'dis rab tu ston te /
translated: This is taught by this.

original: 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni de nyid sems dang yid ces bya ba ste rnam grangs so //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni de nyid sems dang yid ces bya ba ste rnam grangs so //
translated: The consciousness that arises from the luminous clarity is itself called mind and thought.

original: de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid can chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste /
analyzed: de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid can chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste /
translated: It is the root of all phenomena, having the nature of both affliction and purification.

original: de bas na der rlung la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa yod na rnam par rtog pa gnyis rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na der rlung la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa yod na rnam par rtog pa gnyis rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when the consciousness that is based on the wind exists, the two types of conceptualization arise.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba yod pa na //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba yod pa na //
translated: When there is what is called ‚Äúself‚Äù and ‚Äúother,‚Äù

original: rang dang gzhan gyi dbye bas yongs 'dzin skyon//
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi dbye bas yongs 'dzin skyon//
translated: the faults of grasping at ‚Äúself‚Äù and ‚Äúother‚Äù arise.

original: @165b de dag gis ni kun du bcings pa na //
analyzed: @165b de dag gis ni kun du bcings pa na //
translated: When one is completely bound by those,

original: nyes pa thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: all faults arise.

original: de bas na rlung las me /
analyzed: de bas na rlung las me /
translated: Therefore, from the wind arises fire.

original: me las chu /
analyzed: me las chu /
translated: From fire arises water.

original: chu las sa ste /
analyzed: chu las sa ste /
translated: From water arises earth.

original: de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched dang / yul rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched dang / yul rnams so //
translated: From those arise the five aggregates, the sense bases, and the objects.

original: de'i mod la rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin snang ba'i rgyu ba gsal bar nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de'i mod la rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin snang ba'i rgyu ba gsal bar nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: At that very moment, the movement of the appearance of the nature of the three consciousnesses is clearly experienced.

original: snang ba'i rgyu las kyang rang bzhin thams cad kyis kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: snang ba'i rgyu las kyang rang bzhin thams cad kyis kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The cause of appearance is also called ‚Äúthe origin of all natures.‚Äù

original: rnam par shes pa gsum yang thabs dang shes rab dang gsal ba dang mi gsal ba ste rnam grangs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gsum yang thabs dang shes rab dang gsal ba dang mi gsal ba ste rnam grangs so //
translated: The three consciousnesses are method, wisdom, clarity, and nonclarity.

original: de la snang ba dang snang ba mched pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo gsal ba'i phyogs so //
analyzed: de la snang ba dang snang ba mched pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo gsal ba'i phyogs so //
translated: Among those, appearance and the appearance of increase are the aspect of clarity, which is the nature of method and wisdom.üîΩThe words of the symbolic term are the words of the neutral state.

original: dgos pa'i brda'i tshig ni ma ning gi tshig dang / snang ba thob pa ni mi gsal ba'i phyogs so //
analyzed: dgos pa'i brda'i tshig ni ma ning gi tshig dang / snang ba thob pa ni mi gsal ba'i phyogs so //
translated: The attainment of appearance is the aspect of nonclarity.

original: gzhan yang sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gzhan dbang dang / yongs su grub pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya ba ni rnam grangs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gzhan dbang dang / yongs su grub pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya ba ni rnam grangs te /
translated: Moreover, mind, thought, consciousness, the dependent, the perfect, desire, anger, and ignorance are synonyms.

original: thams cad 'khor ba'i thun mong gi chos so //
analyzed: thams cad 'khor ba'i thun mong gi chos so //
translated: All of those are the common phenomena of samsƒÅra.

original: de'i gnyen po ngo bo rnam par byang ba'i chos te /
analyzed: de'i gnyen po ngo bo rnam par byang ba'i chos te /
translated: The antidote to that is the reality of purification.

original: des na theg pa chen po pa rnams kyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam grangs ston te /
analyzed: des na theg pa chen po pa rnams kyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam grangs ston te /
translated: Therefore, the followers of the Great Vehicle teach the uncommon enumeration.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba la stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa chen po dang / snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa dang / sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba la stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa chen po dang / snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa dang / sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
translated: The appearance is the empty, the very empty, the great empty, the light, the increase of light, the culmination of light, the mind, the mental factor, the passion,

original: 'dod chags bar ma zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags bar ma zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and the medium passion.

original: bzhi pa yang thams cad stod pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: bzhi pa yang thams cad stod pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The fourth is the characteristic of the complete purification of all.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood by the distinction of cause and effect.

original: de nyid gsal bar ston te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar ston te /
translated: That is clarified.

original: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In wisdom, and so on,

original: shes rab ni bdag med par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni bdag med par mthong ba'o //
translated: wisdom is the vision of selflessness.

original: thabs ni snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: thabs ni snying rje chen po'o //
translated: Skillful means is great compassion.

original: de dag yang dag par sbyor ba ni gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: de dag yang dag par sbyor ba ni gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: The union of those two is nonduality.

original: rdzogs pa'i nye bar thob pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i nye bar thob pa'i ye shes skyed pa'o //
translated: and the pristine wisdom of the attainment of completion.

original: de dag las kyang 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad stong pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag las kyang 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad stong pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: And from those, the pristine wisdom of the emptiness of all the characteristics of clear light will arise.

original: 'di ltar rgyu'i rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa bla na med pa'i gnas 'thob ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu'i rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa bla na med pa'i gnas 'thob ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, the process of the cause is purified, and one attains the stainless, unsurpassed stage.

original: gzhan yang @166a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang @166a * //
translated: Moreover,

original: rnam par shes pa gsum rnam par dag pas stong pa gsum rnam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo rab tu ston te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gsum rnam par dag pas stong pa gsum rnam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo rab tu ston te /
translated: the purification of the three consciousnesses is the purification of the three emptinesses, which is taught to be the nature of cause and effect.

original: de nyid snang ba dang / stong ba dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / gzhan dbang gi ngo bo dang / sems zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs su brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid snang ba dang / stong ba dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / gzhan dbang gi ngo bo dang / sems zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs su brjod pa'o //
translated: That is the nature of appearance, emptiness, wisdom, pristine wisdom, and the dependent, and is called ‚Äúmind.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin gyi sems de'i mtshan nyid gsal bar ston te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi sems de'i mtshan nyid gsal bar ston te /
translated: The nature of that mind is clearly taught.

original: de yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang brgyad ni brjod mi dgos te go sla'o //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang brgyad ni brjod mi dgos te go sla'o //
translated: The first seven and a half verses are easy to understand and do not need to be explained.

original: chags bral zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chags bral zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The term free from attachment and so on.

original: 'dir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems ni yid du 'ong  ba mthong bsam chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems ni yid du 'ong  ba mthong bsam chags pa'o //
translated: Here, the mind free from attachment is the desire to see what is pleasing.

original: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang / chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang / chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold by way of the distinctions of weak, middling, and strong.

original: yid 'gro zhing 'ong ba ni sems rnam par g-yo ba ni mya ngan la sogs pa gsum zhes bya ba ni sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur na yid la sems shing gdung ba'o //
analyzed: yid 'gro zhing 'ong ba ni sems rnam par g-yo ba ni mya ngan la sogs pa gsum zhes bya ba ni sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur na yid la sems shing gdung ba'o //
translated: The mind that goes and comes is the movement of the mind. The three of sorrow and so on are the mental anguish that occurs when one is separated from what is pleasing.

original: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang / chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang / chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold by way of the distinctions of weak, middling, and strong.

original: zhi ba la zhes bya ba la ni sems zhi bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la zhes bya ba la ni sems zhi bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The term in peace is the mind abiding in peace.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni rgod par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni rgod par gnas pa'o //
translated: The term conceptualization is the mind abiding in agitation.

original: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni yid du mi 'ong ba dang phrad par gyur na sems skrag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni yid du mi 'ong ba dang phrad par gyur na sems skrag par gyur pa'o //
translated: The term fear is the mind that is frightened when encountering what is unpleasant.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold as before.

original: srid pa ni yul la zhen pa ste /
analyzed: srid pa ni yul la zhen pa ste /
translated: The term existence is the clinging to objects.

original: de yang yul gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang yul gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The three types of objects are as before.

original: nye bar len pa ni gzhan gyi nor yid kyis len par byed pa'am /
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni gzhan gyi nor yid kyis len par byed pa'am /
translated: Taking what is not given is to take the wealth of others by force or to take it by stealth.

original: yul rnams la kun du 'dzin pa'o//
analyzed: yul rnams la kun du 'dzin pa'o//
translated: To covet is to covet the objects of others.

original: mi dge ba ni dge ba'i las la yid gnyis za ba'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni dge ba'i las la yid gnyis za ba'o //
translated: To have wrong views is to doubt virtuous actions.

original: bkres pa dang skom pa ni rang gi rgyun du nyams su myong zhing 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bkres pa dang skom pa ni rang gi rgyun du nyams su myong zhing 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Hunger and thirst are the characteristics of the experience of one‚Äôs own continuum.

original: tshor ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba ste /
analyzed: tshor ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba ste /
translated: Sensation is the experience of the aspects of pleasure, pain, and neither pleasure nor pain.

original: de yang yul gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang yul gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The three types of objects are as before.

original: rig dang rig 'dzin zhes bya ba la /üîΩrig pa ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: rig dang rig 'dzin zhes bya ba la / rig pa ni rig pa'o //
translated: Knowledge and the possessor of knowledge are as follows.üîΩKnowledge is the object of knowledge.

original: rig 'dzin ni rang gi rig pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: rig 'dzin ni rang gi rig pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: The possessor of knowledge is the consciousness that knows itself.

original: de dag gi gzhi ni gnas te /
analyzed: de dag gi gzhi ni gnas te /
translated: Their basis is the abode.

original: dmigs pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúobject‚Äù is that.

original: so sor rtog pa ni rigs dang mi rigs pa dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa ni rigs dang mi rigs pa dpyod pa'o //
translated: Discernment is the analysis of what is reasonable and unreasonable.

original: ngo tsha shes pa @166b ni kha na ma tho ba la 'dzem pa'o //
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa @166b ni kha na ma tho ba la 'dzem pa'o //
translated: Shame is the avoidance of what is blameworthy.

original: snying rje ni sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa'i sems so //
analyzed: snying rje ni sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa'i sems so //
translated: Compassion is the desire that beings be free from suffering.

original: brtse ba ni dmigs bya yongs su srung ba'am sdug pa dang phrad par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: brtse ba ni dmigs bya yongs su srung ba'am sdug pa dang phrad par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Love is the desire that beings come into contact with what is pleasant.

original: de yang lus kyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang lus kyi bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Moreover, these are threefold by way of the distinctions of the body.

original: dogs pa ni sems nges par mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dogs pa ni sems nges par mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Fear is the lack of stability of the mind.

original: bsags pa ni yo byad yongs su sdud pa'o //
analyzed: bsags pa ni yo byad yongs su sdud pa'o //
translated: Accumulation is the gathering of the requisites.

original: ser sna'i blos mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: ser sna'i blos mi gtong ba'o //
translated: Stinginess is the non-giving due to a greedy mind.

original: rang bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum po de dag mi rnams kyis rang rig pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum po de dag mi rnams kyis rang rig pa'o //
translated: These thirty-three natures are known by men.

original: de yang kun rdzob gsal ba'i ngo bos mtshan mo zhes bya bar bstan te /
analyzed: de yang kun rdzob gsal ba'i ngo bos mtshan mo zhes bya bar bstan te /
translated: Moreover, they are taught as the night by the nature of the manifestation of the relative.

original: de nyid kyis bud med dang 'jam po lta bu zhes bya'o ;
analyzed: de nyid kyis bud med dang 'jam po lta bu zhes bya'o ;
translated: By that very [nature], they are taught as the female and the gentle.

original: / g-yon pa zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / padma zhes bya ba yang bstan te /
analyzed: / g-yon pa zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / padma zhes bya ba yang bstan te /
translated: The left, the orb of the moon, and the lotus are also taught.

original: 'dir 'jam po lta bu dang / g-yon pa zhes bya ba zla ba'i snang ba mched pas g-yon pa la brten pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dir 'jam po lta bu dang / g-yon pa zhes bya ba zla ba'i snang ba mched pas g-yon pa la brten pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Here, ‚Äúgentle‚Äù and ‚Äúleft‚Äù are because the appearance of the moon increases on the left.

original: 'jam po ni shin tu gzhon pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam po ni shin tu gzhon pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Gentle‚Äù means very young.

original: g-yon pa zhes bya bas kyang 'dir byang phyogs su 'gro ba'i ming du brjod do //
analyzed: g-yon pa zhes bya bas kyang 'dir byang phyogs su 'gro ba'i ming du brjod do //
translated: ‚Äú Left‚Äù also means here the name of the northern direction.

original: 'di nyid dang po'i las can brtan par byed pa'i rgyu dang po'i dbyangs yig thig le dang bcas pa rab tu bstan pa aom ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid dang po'i las can brtan par byed pa'i rgyu dang po'i dbyangs yig thig le dang bcas pa rab tu bstan pa aom ste /
translated: This is the first vowel sound with a bindu, which is taught to be the first cause of stabilizing the beginner.

original: de bsgom pa 'phel bar gyur pas kyang /
analyzed: de bsgom pa 'phel bar gyur pas kyang /
translated: By the increase of the meditation on that,

original: zla ba'i 'od zer snang ba lta bu snang ba'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od zer snang ba lta bu snang ba'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung ba ste /
translated: the pristine consciousness of appearance arises, which is like the appearance of the light of the moon.

original: skye zhes bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: skye zhes bya bar gsungs so //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúarises.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis shes rab dang snying rje la dmigs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rang bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis shes rab dang snying rje la dmigs pa gsungs te /
translated: The thirty-two natures are said to be the focus of wisdom and compassion.

original: stong pa'i khongs su gtogs pa snang ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa'i khongs su gtogs pa snang ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of appearance is included in emptiness.

original: da ni thabs kyi ye shes la gtsor dmigs pa shin tu stong pa'i khongs su gtogs pa /
analyzed: da ni thabs kyi ye shes la gtsor dmigs pa shin tu stong pa'i khongs su gtogs pa /
translated: Now, the wisdom of the method is mainly observed, which belongs to the category of utter emptiness.

original: rang bzhin tshig le'ur byas pa bdun gyis ston te /
analyzed: rang bzhin tshig le'ur byas pa bdun gyis ston te /
translated: It is taught by seven verses of natural composition.

original: snang ba mched pa dang / shin tu stong ba dang / thabs kyi ye shes dang yongs su brtags pa dang / sems las byung ba zhes bya ba ni phyogs gcig ste /
analyzed: snang ba mched pa dang / shin tu stong ba dang / thabs kyi ye shes dang yongs su brtags pa dang / sems las byung ba zhes bya ba ni phyogs gcig ste /
translated: Appearance, increase, utter emptiness, the wisdom of the method, the thoroughly imagined, and what is called mental events are one part.

original: rnam grangs kyi dbye bar bstan to //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi dbye bar bstan to //
translated: It is taught as a classification of synonyms.

original: chags pa zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa'i yul la yid kun du chags pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa'i yul la yid kun du chags pa'o //
translated: Attachment is the mental attachment to an unattained object.

original: zhen pa ni thob pa'i yul la chags pa'o //
analyzed: zhen pa ni thob pa'i yul la chags pa'o //
translated: Craving is attachment to an attained object.

original: dga' ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po mthong bas sems dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po mthong bas sems dga' ba'o //
translated: Joy is the delight of the mind by seeing a pleasing thing.

original: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo //üîΩrangs @167a * //
analyzed: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum mo // rangs @167a * //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold by the distinctions of lesser, middling, and greater.

original: pa'i sems kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'grub pas bde ba'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: pa'i sems kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'grub pas bde ba'i gnas skabs so //
translated: The mind of delight is the state of happiness by accomplishing the desired thing.

original: rab tu mgu ba ni de'i rnam pa'i sems kyis yang dang yang du nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu mgu ba ni de'i rnam pa'i sems kyis yang dang yang du nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Great delight is the experience of that form again and again with a delighted mind.

original: ngo mtshar zhes bya bas ni gtam sna tshogs pas ci 'di yin nam ma yin snyam du the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar zhes bya bas ni gtam sna tshogs pas ci 'di yin nam ma yin snyam du the tshom za ba'o //
translated: Astonishment is the doubt, Is this or is this not? due to various stories.

original: dgod pa ni yid du 'ong ba mthong bas dgod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dgod pa ni yid du 'ong ba mthong bas dgod par byed pa'o //
translated: Laughter is the laughter that arises from seeing something pleasing.

original: tshim pa ni bde ba'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: tshim pa ni bde ba'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Satisfaction is the experience of the form of pleasure.

original: 'khyud pa ni yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po dang lhan cig tu 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: 'khyud pa ni yid du 'ong ba'i dngos po dang lhan cig tu 'dres pa'o //
translated: Embracing is the mixing together with a pleasing object.

original: 'o byed de bzhin 'jib ces bya ba ni go sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'o byed de bzhin 'jib ces bya ba ni go sla ba nyid do //
translated: Kissing and sucking are easy to understand.

original: brtan pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: Firm is unmoving.

original: brtson 'grus ni dge ba la mchog tu gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni dge ba la mchog tu gzhol ba'o //
translated: Diligence is the supreme engagement in virtue.

original: nga rgyal ni mthong ba sems pa'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal ni mthong ba sems pa'o //
translated: Pride is the thought of seeing.

original: las ni rtag tu spyod pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: las ni rtag tu spyod pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Action is the completion of the activity of always engaging.

original: 'phrog pa ni gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrog pa ni gzhan gyi nor 'phrog par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Stealing is the desire to take the wealth of others.

original: stobs ni g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: stobs ni g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Power is the desire to fight in battle.

original: spro ba ni dge ba'i las la goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba ni dge ba'i las la goms par byed pa'o //
translated: Enthusiasm is the habit of virtuous actions.

original: tsham tshom med pa ni dreg pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i las la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: tsham tshom med pa ni dreg pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i las la spyod pa'o //
translated: Lack of hesitation is the performance of non-virtuous actions out of pride.

original: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang / chen po'i bye breg  gis rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang dman pa dang / bar ma dang / chen po'i bye breg  gis rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: It is also threefold, distinguished as weak, middling, and strong.

original: drag pa ni sgyu med par yang dam pa rnams dang / rtsod par sems pa'o //üîΩsgeg pa ni yid du 'ong ba mthong bas 'gying pa'i sems sam /
analyzed: drag pa ni sgyu med par yang dam pa rnams dang / rtsod par sems pa'o // sgeg pa ni yid du 'ong ba mthong bas 'gying pa'i sems sam /
translated: Violence is the intention to dispute with the holy ones, even without deceit.

original: rtse bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: rtse bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: Playfulness is the mind of arrogance due to seeing what is pleasing, or the desire to play.

original: zhe 'gras pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba spong bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: zhe 'gras pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba spong bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: Anger is the desire to abandon what is unpleasing.

original: dge ba ni dge ba'i las la brtson par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba ni dge ba'i las la brtson par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Virtue is the desire to strive in virtuous actions.

original: tshig gsal ba ni thogs pa med par tshig brjod pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gsal ba ni thogs pa med par tshig brjod pa'o //
translated: Clarity is the expression of words without hesitation.

original: bden pa ni 'khrugs pa med pa'i ngag go //
analyzed: bden pa ni 'khrugs pa med pa'i ngag go //
translated: Truth is speech that is not agitated.

original: mi bden pa ni de las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: mi bden pa ni de las bzlog pa'o //
translated: Untruth is the opposite of that.

original: nges pa ni shin tu brtan pa'i yi dam mo //
analyzed: nges pa ni shin tu brtan pa'i yi dam mo //
translated: Certainty is a very firm commitment.

original: nye bar mi len pa ni dngos po thams cad yongs su 'dzin par mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar mi len pa ni dngos po thams cad yongs su 'dzin par mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: Non-appropriation is the desire not to grasp at all things.

original: sbyin pa po ni rang gi bdog pa yongs su gtong bar byed pa'i yid do//
analyzed: sbyin pa po ni rang gi bdog pa yongs su gtong bar byed pa'i yid do//
translated: The giver is the mind that gives away one's own possessions.

original: bskul ba ni le lo can gyi sems 'dzud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bskul ba ni le lo can gyi sems 'dzud par byed pa'o //
translated: Urging is the mind that engages the lazy.

original: dpa' bo ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra las rgyal bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra las rgyal bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: The hero is the one who wishes to conquer the enemy of the afflictions.

original: ngo tsha med pa ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i las rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: ngo tsha med pa ni kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'i las rtsom pa'o //
translated: Shamelessness is the undertaking of actions with faults.

original: sgyu ni bcos mas gzhan slu ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu ni bcos mas gzhan slu ba'o //
translated: Deception is the deceiving of others through pretense.

original: 'dug pa ni lta ba ngan pa la byang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dug pa ni lta ba ngan pa la byang ba'o //
translated: Sitting is the training in bad views.

original: g-yo @167b ni rang gi skyon 'chab pa la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo @167b ni rang gi skyon 'chab pa la brtson pa'o //
translated: Guile is the effort to conceal one's own faults.

original: gya gyu ni drang po ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gya gyu ni drang po ma yin pa'o //
translated: Cunning is not straightforward.

original: rang bzhin bzhi bcu de dag ni shin tu stong pa'i khongs su gtogs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin bzhi bcu de dag ni shin tu stong pa'i khongs su gtogs par rig par bya'o //
translated: These forty natures should be known as included within emptiness.

original: de yang skad cig ma ste /
analyzed: de yang skad cig ma ste /
translated: And that is momentary,

original: mi gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it does not remain.

original: rtsub pa'i rnam pa ni 'jam pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rtsub pa'i rnam pa ni 'jam pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: The aspect of roughness is not smoothness,

original: rad rod ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rad rod ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: up to the roughness of gravel.

original: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas su 'gro bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas su 'gro bar shes par bya ste /
translated: The right is to be understood as going to the right.

original: nyi ma'i snang ba mched pas g-yas pa'i phyogs su brten pa nyid kyis kyang 'dis nyin mo dang / skyes pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu bstan te /
analyzed: nyi ma'i snang ba mched pas g-yas pa'i phyogs su brten pa nyid kyis kyang 'dis nyin mo dang / skyes pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu bstan te /
translated: Since the light of the sun is extended, it is also supported on the right side, and thus it is taught as day, male, the orb of the sun, and vajra.

original: rdo rje'i ming ni 'dir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ming ni 'dir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The name vajra here means the orb of the sun, and the meaning is that one should meditate on it.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na skad cig ma nyid du bstan pas skyon du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na skad cig ma nyid du bstan pas skyon du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, there would be the fault of teaching momentariness.

original: 'dir dang po'i las can bstan par bya ba'i phyir sa bon bsgom pa ston te /
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i las can bstan par bya ba'i phyir sa bon bsgom pa ston te /
translated: Here, in order to teach the beginner, the meditation on the seed is taught.

original: cha zhes bya ba de nyid thabs kyi rang bzhin cha ste thog ma'i dbyangs thig le gnyis kyis brgyan zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: cha zhes bya ba de nyid thabs kyi rang bzhin cha ste thog ma'i dbyangs thig le gnyis kyis brgyan zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The part is the nature of the method, and the first vowel is adorned with the two drops.

original: aa de dag bsgom pa la goms par gyur pas 'od zer stong gi gsal ba dang 'dra ba'i snang ba mched pa'i ye shes kun du 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: aa de dag bsgom pa la goms par gyur pas 'od zer stong gi gsal ba dang 'dra ba'i snang ba mched pa'i ye shes kun du 'byung ba ste /
translated: By becoming familiar with the meditation on those a's, the wisdom of the light of the sun, which is like a thousand light rays, arises.

original: rab tu skye bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu skye bar shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood as fully arisen.

original: kha cig  ni snang ba mched pa'i sbyor ba las byung zhes brjod de ;
analyzed: kha cig  ni snang ba mched pa'i sbyor ba las byung zhes brjod de ;
translated: Some say that it arises from the application of the increase of appearance.

original: de ni don dang mi ldan pas dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ni don dang mi ldan pas dor bar bya'o //
translated: That is to be rejected because it is not meaningful.

original: da ni tshig le'ur byas pa bzhis rnam grangs dang bcas pa'i snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin spros pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni tshig le'ur byas pa bzhis rnam grangs dang bcas pa'i snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin spros pa ston te /
translated: Now, by four verses, he teaches the nature of the increase of appearance with its synonyms, and the proliferation.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the verse that begins with ‚Äúappearance,‚Äù

original: snang ba ni thog mar snang ba'i ye shes kyi drod 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba ni thog mar snang ba'i ye shes kyi drod 'byung ba'o //
translated: appearance is the arising of the heat of the pristine consciousness of the initial appearance.

original: nye bar thob pa ni de nyid kyi 'phel bas thob pa ste /
analyzed: nye bar thob pa ni de nyid kyi 'phel bas thob pa ste /
translated: Approaching is the attainment by the increase of just that.

original: ma rig pa rnam par nyams pas thob pa yongs su grub pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa rnam par nyams pas thob pa yongs su grub pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'o //
translated: Attainment is the arising of the pristine consciousness of accomplishment by the destruction of ignorance.

original: 'dis snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid gsum po dang / yongs su grub pa dang rig pa zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
analyzed: 'dis snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid gsum po dang / yongs su grub pa dang rig pa zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs so //
translated: By this, the three characteristics of appearance, the increase of appearance, and the attainment of appearance, and the synonyms ‚Äúaccomplishment‚Äù and ‚Äúawareness‚Äù are synonyms.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud de dang der stong pa chen po gnas nyid du gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud de dang der stong pa chen po gnas nyid du gsungs pa ste /
translated: The TathƒÅgata taught that in this and that tantra, the great emptiness is the state.

original: snga ma byung ba ni cung zad kyang min pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma byung ba ni cung zad kyang min pa'o //
translated: The former is not even slightly present.

original: chags pa bar ma zhes bya ba ni chags pa bar ma'i skad cig gis gnas skabs kyi sems slong ba'o //
analyzed: chags pa bar ma zhes bya ba ni chags pa bar ma'i skad cig gis gnas skabs kyi sems slong ba'o //
translated: The middling attachment is the arousal of the mind in the state of the middling moment of attachment.

original: brjed ngas pa ni sngar nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i don la yongs su 'khrul @168a * //
analyzed: brjed ngas pa ni sngar nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i don la yongs su 'khrul @168a * //
translated: Forgetfulness is the confusion about the meaning that has been experienced before.

original: pa'o ; /'khrul ba ni g-yeng ba'i sems te spre'u lta bu'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; /'khrul ba ni g-yeng ba'i sems te spre'u lta bu'o //
translated: Distraction is the distracted mind, like a monkey.

original: mi smra bar gyur pa ni lkugs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mi smra bar gyur pa ni lkugs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Dumbness is like dumbness.

original: skyo ba ni yid la sems pas sems dub pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba ni yid la sems pas sems dub pa'o //
translated: Weariness is the exhaustion of the mind by mental activity.

original: le lo ni snyom las so //
analyzed: le lo ni snyom las so //
translated: Laziness is indolence.

original: the tshom ni ma nges pa'i sems byung ba'o //
analyzed: the tshom ni ma nges pa'i sems byung ba'o //
translated: Doubt is the arising of an uncertain mind.

original: rang bzhin bdun po de dag ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor la goms shing gzhol bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin bdun po de dag ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor la goms shing gzhol bar shes par bya'o //
translated: These seven natures should be known as the subtle yoga, the familiarization and the inclination.

original: de nyid kyis na de las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid ston te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid ston te /
translated: By that very thing, the characteristic of attaining the light that is the opposite of that is taught:

original: sa bon thig ler ldan min la //
analyzed: sa bon thig ler ldan min la //
translated: The seed is not endowed with the bindu,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: sa bon ni sngags kyi yi ge bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: sa bon ni sngags kyi yi ge bsgom pa ste /
translated: The seed is the meditation on the mantra syllable.

original: steng du thig le dang bcas pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: steng du thig le dang bcas pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is the syllable with a drop above it.

original: de bsgom pa la sbyor bar mi bya ba dang / sna'i bu ga'i rlung gi sgo nas kyang kun du mi rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgom pa la sbyor bar mi bya ba dang / sna'i bu ga'i rlung gi sgo nas kyang kun du mi rgyu ba'o //
translated: One should not apply oneself to the meditation on that, and it should not move out through the door of the wind of the nostril.

original: de nyid kyis ni snang ba yod pa na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni snang ba yod pa na /
translated: By that very thing, when there is appearance,

original: ma rig pa rnam par bcom ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa rnam par bcom ste /
translated: ignorance is destroyed.

original: gang zhig ye shes kyis skad cig nye bar dmigs shing thob pa de snang ba thob pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ye shes kyis skad cig nye bar dmigs shing thob pa de snang ba thob pa'o //
translated: That which is perceived and attained by gnosis in an instant is the attainment of appearance.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: snang ba thob pa'i gnas skabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams sa bon bsgom par bya ba la sbyar bar mi bya zhing srog dang rtsol ba bsgom par yang mi bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba thob pa'i gnas skabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams sa bon bsgom par bya ba la sbyar bar mi bya zhing srog dang rtsol ba bsgom par yang mi bya zhes bya'o //
translated: The yogis and yoginis who have attained the stage of the attainment of appearance should not apply themselves to the meditation on the seed syllable, and they should not meditate on the wind of life and exertion.

original: de nyid sems mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid sems mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: That very thing is the characteristic of the samadhi of the unwavering mind.

original: de dag ni rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: de dag ni rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug bsdu ba ste /
translated: They are summarized by ‚Äúthose are the natures,‚Äù and so on.

original: rang bzhin sngar bshad pa de dag gi dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis na grangs brgyad cur 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin sngar bshad pa de dag gi dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis na grangs brgyad cur 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The eighty are established by the threefold division of the natures explained above.

original: phra mo zhes bya ba ni brtag par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: phra mo zhes bya ba ni brtag par dka' ba'o //

original: de yang nyin mtshan gyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur du brtsis na /
analyzed: de yang nyin mtshan gyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur du brtsis na /
translated: When those are doubled by the division of day and night,

original: rang bzhin brgya drug cur 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin brgya drug cur 'gyur ba ste /
translated: they become the one hundred and sixty natures.

original: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa la yang 'byung ba'o ;
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa la yang 'byung ba'o ;
translated: They also occur in those born from eggs and so on.

original: / ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: / ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: rlung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe rlung bzhon pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rlung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe rlung bzhon pa'i ngo bo 'dzin pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the natures ride on the wind,üîΩthey enter and exit more and more.

original: de dag rang bzhin yar nas yang du 'jug par 'gyur zhas bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag rang bzhin yar nas yang du 'jug par 'gyur zhas bya ba'i don to //

original: rlung med na rnam par shes pa med la /
analyzed: rlung med na rnam par shes pa med la /

original: de med na rang bzhin rnams kyang med par 'gyur zhes stan to //
analyzed: de med na rang bzhin rnams kyang med par 'gyur zhes stan to //
translated: When that does not exist, the natures also do not exist.

original: rnam par shes pa ni gnas med pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni gnas med pa /
translated: Consciousness is without abode,

original: gnas pa med pa /
analyzed: gnas pa med pa /
translated: without location,

original: rtag pa med pa /
analyzed: rtag pa med pa /
translated: without permanence,

original: kha dog dang dbyibs med cing /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs med cing /

original: dbang po'i yul las 'das pa /
analyzed: dbang po'i yul las 'das pa /
translated: and beyond the objects of the senses.

original: yan lag dang nyid lag med cing /
analyzed: yan lag dang nyid lag med cing /
translated: It is not a limb or a secondary limb,

analyzed: dbang po ma yin pas sngo ba sangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lhag par yang kha @168b dog ma yin pa ma yin nam /

original: rang bzhin de ci ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin de ci ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di rlung dang lhan cig tu 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags par ma dang / 'dod chags bral ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rjes su dpag pas nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /

original: 'dir gang du yang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: 'dir gang du yang 'gal ba med do //
translated: Here there is no contradiction at all.

original: gal te rnal 'byor ji ltar nyams su myong zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnal 'byor ji ltar nyams su myong zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how the yogin experiences it,

analyzed: skad cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: skad cig ni mthe bo dang gung mo sbyar nas gtogs pa'i sgra de la skad cig ces bya'o //
analyzed: skad cig ni mthe bo dang gung mo sbyar nas gtogs pa'i sgra de la skad cig ces bya'o //

original: thang cig ni gzugs la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba mthong bas reg pa 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: thang cig ni gzugs la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba mthong bas reg pa 'jug pa'o //
translated: A tatk·π£a·πáa is the engagement of contact through seeing a pleasant form and so on.

original: yud tsam ni dbugs rdub  pa tsam gyi tshad do //
analyzed: yud tsam ni dbugs rdub  pa tsam gyi tshad do //

analyzed: mig 'dzum pa ni phye ba la ltos pa tsam mo //

original: thal mo ni lag pa dang lag pa brdabs pa'o //
analyzed: thal mo ni lag pa dang lag pa brdabs pa'o //
translated: A clap is the sound of the hands.

original: phra ba'i khams 'jug pas skad cig la sogs pa phan tshun gang de nyams su myong ba grub pa zhes bya bar dgongs te /
analyzed: phra ba'i khams 'jug pas skad cig la sogs pa phan tshun gang de nyams su myong ba grub pa zhes bya bar dgongs te /
translated: The experience of the mutual experience of moments and so on is established by the engagement of the subtle dhƒÅtu.

original: skad cig la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
translated: The characteristics of moments and so on have been explained.

original: da ni sngar bshad pa'i don lung gzhan dgongs pa bla na med pa'i mdo sde tshig le'ur byas pa sngar bsgrub cing ston te /
analyzed: da ni sngar bshad pa'i don lung gzhan dgongs pa bla na med pa'i mdo sde tshig le'ur byas pa sngar bsgrub cing ston te /
translated: Now, the meaning of the previously explained [topics] is established and taught in the previously established verse of the Unexcelled Intention S≈´tra.

original: rang rig ces bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig ces bya ba ni nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Self-awareness is experience.

original: re zhig tsam gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi ye shes kyi ngo bo de rang rig pa tsam mo //
analyzed: re zhig tsam gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi ye shes kyi ngo bo de rang rig pa tsam mo //
translated: The characteristic of the mere moment is that its nature is the mere self-awareness of gnosis.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na /

original: nam mkha' lta bur sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur sgrib pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It has the characteristic of being unobstructed, like space.

original: 'on kyang zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan pa'o //
translated: But, however, is another position.

original: de'i ye shes kyi rnam pa spangs pa'i dbye ba gsum gyi bdag nyid de dag dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i ye shes kyi rnam pa spangs pa'i dbye ba gsum gyi bdag nyid de dag dang ldan pa ste /
translated: It is endowed with those three aspects that are the nature of the abandonment of its aspects of gnosis.

original: 'di ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni snang ba'o //
translated: Night is illumination.

original: nyin mo zhes bya ba ni snang ba mched pa'o //
analyzed: nyin mo zhes bya ba ni snang ba mched pa'o //
