original: mtshams zhes bya ba ni snang ba thob pa ste gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi rang gi ngo bor rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: mtshams zhes bya ba ni snang ba thob pa ste gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi rang gi ngo bor rab tu bstan to //
translated: Twilight is the attainment of illumination. Its nature is taught to be the nature of the three.

original: de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to clarify that, it is said, ‚Äúillumination,‚Äù and so on.

original: de la shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi zla ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi zla ba lta bu'o //
translated: There, the wisdom gnosis is like one‚Äôs own moon.

original: stong pa tsam zhas bya ba ni /
analyzed: stong pa tsam zhas bya ba ni /
translated: The mere emptiness is

original: snang ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: snang ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the characteristic of the appearance of pristine consciousness.

original: de yang dri ma dang bcas par snang ba ste /
analyzed: de yang dri ma dang bcas par snang ba ste /
translated: Moreover, it appears with stains,

original: @169a * // shin tu srab pa'i dar ser pos g-yogs pa'i mig lta bu'o //
analyzed: @169a * // shin tu srab pa'i dar ser pos g-yogs pa'i mig lta bu'o //
translated: like eyes covered with a very thin yellow cloth.

original: thabs ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu shin tu stong pa ni gsal bar snang ba ste /
analyzed: thabs ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu shin tu stong pa ni gsal bar snang ba ste /
translated: The essence of the method pristine consciousness, which is very empty like the appearance of the sun, is the appearance of clarity.

original: sgrib g-yogs dang bral ba'i mig gis lag mthil gyi skyu rur mthong ba lta bu ni snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid do//
analyzed: sgrib g-yogs dang bral ba'i mig gis lag mthil gyi skyu rur mthong ba lta bu ni snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid do//
translated: Like eyes free of obscurations seeing a myrobalan fruit in the palm of the hand, this is the characteristic of the increase of appearance.

original: shes pa gnyis spangs pa'i mtshan ma dang / mtshams lta bu ni stong pa chen po'i mtshan nyid rab rib kyis nyams pa'i mig lta bu ste /
analyzed: shes pa gnyis spangs pa'i mtshan ma dang / mtshams lta bu ni stong pa chen po'i mtshan nyid rab rib kyis nyams pa'i mig lta bu ste /
translated: The sign of abandoning the two consciousnesses, like the boundary, is the characteristic of the great emptiness, like eyes impaired by myodesopsia.üîΩThis is the characteristic of attaining appearance.

original: 'di ni snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid de de nyid kyis na snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid de de nyid kyis na snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called the increase of appearance.

original: sems kyi dbye ba rnam pa gsum du gsungs so //
analyzed: sems kyi dbye ba rnam pa gsum du gsungs so //
translated: The three divisions of the mind are explained.

original: de'i gzhi ni brjod par bya ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i gzhi ni brjod par bya ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: The basis of that is called the object of expression.

original: bzhon pa ni bzhon pa ste /
analyzed: bzhon pa ni bzhon pa ste /
translated: Vehicle means the vehicle.

original: skyes bu'i bzhon pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: skyes bu'i bzhon pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a vehicle for a person.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i 'o //
translated: His means of consciousness.

original: rlung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rlung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: The winds are subtle form.

original: rlung ni tha mal par g-yo bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rlung ni tha mal par g-yo bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The winds are the usual movements.

original: phra ba ni brtag dga' ba'i ngo bo shes pa ste /
analyzed: phra ba ni brtag dga' ba'i ngo bo shes pa ste /
translated: Subtle means the nature of what is to be examined.

original: shes pa rnam pa gsum po de dang yang 'dres par 'gyur cing mig la sogs pa'i sgo nas byung nas gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul la dmigs shing 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa rnam pa gsum po de dang yang 'dres par 'gyur cing mig la sogs pa'i sgo nas byung nas gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i yul la dmigs shing 'dzin pa'o //
translated: That consciousness becomes mixed with those three aspects and, having emerged through the door of the eyes and so on, it observes and apprehends objects such as form and sound.

original: snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: snang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Appearance and so on.

original: snang ba ni dang por snang ba'i drod 'byung ba ste /üîΩde bas na gang gi tshe de dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rlung gi bzhon pa dang phrad par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: snang ba ni dang por snang ba'i drod 'byung ba ste / de bas na gang gi tshe de dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rlung gi bzhon pa dang phrad par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: Appearance is the arising of the heat of the initial appearance.üîΩTherefore, when it is united with the vehicle of the winds, at that time it enters into the nature of all things.

original: dngos po mtha' dag gi rang bzhin la 'jug par byed cing des 'thad pa ma yin par 'jug par byed pa 'am /
analyzed: dngos po mtha' dag gi rang bzhin la 'jug par byed cing des 'thad pa ma yin par 'jug par byed pa 'am /
translated: It enters into what is not tenable.

original: bsdus pa dang nges so so re re re phye ba ste /
analyzed: bsdus pa dang nges so so re re re phye ba ste /
translated: The concise and the extensive are each divided into two.

original: 'dis nges pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis nges pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the uncertainty.

original: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In regard to where, etc.

original: gang du srog chags skye zhing gnas pa'i gzugs te /
analyzed: gang du srog chags skye zhing gnas pa'i gzugs te /
translated: The form in which living beings are born and abide is the wind.

original: rlung gnas pa de dang de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par 'byung zhing 'dzin zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
analyzed: rlung gnas pa de dang de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par 'byung zhing 'dzin zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the words is that it arises and is held in the nature of that wind.

original: dus ji srid cig la ni srid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dus ji srid cig la ni srid ces bya ba ste /
translated: For how long does it exist?

original: ji srid dngos po mtha' dag ye shes kyi skad cig ma brtan par ma gyur pa nge srid du de'i khyad par g-yo ba zhes bya ba yongs su srog chags bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid dngos po mtha' dag ye shes kyi skad cig ma brtan par ma gyur pa nge srid du de'i khyad par g-yo ba zhes bya ba yongs su srog chags bskyod pa ste /
translated: For as long as the totality of entities is not stabilized in the instant of gnosis, for that long its special movement is called the shaking of living beings.

original: gang la 'dzud pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la 'dzud pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That in which it is placed is called that.

original: da ni yi ge gsum gyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu 'od gsal bar bstan to //
analyzed: da ni yi ge gsum gyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu 'od gsal bar bstan to //
translated: Now, the cause and result of the three syllables are taught to be clear light.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag gi ba la bdag dngos po ni /
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag gi ba la bdag dngos po ni /
translated: In regard to appearance, etc., the meaning of the words is that

original: rang gi yid gang gis @169b nyon mongs pa spong zhing rnam pa rtog pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: rang gi yid gang gis @169b nyon mongs pa spong zhing rnam pa rtog pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba'i gnas skabs so //
translated: One‚Äôs own mind is the state in which one abandons the afflictions and is free from the nature of conceptual thoughts.

original: de nyid rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i snang ba gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i snang ba gnyis pa'o //
translated: That itself is the second appearance of cause, condition, and effect.

original: gnas skabs gang du snang ba thob pa 'bras bur gyur pa der gnyi ga yang rgyu ste /
analyzed: gnas skabs gang du snang ba thob pa 'bras bur gyur pa der gnyi ga yang rgyu ste /
translated: In whatever state the attainment of appearance becomes the effect, there both are causes.

original: snang ba mched pa gang gi rgyu yin pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: snang ba mched pa gang gi rgyu yin pa de la de skad ces brjod do //
translated: That which is the cause of the appearance of increase is called that.

original: ye shes gsum po yang gang du nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ston to //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po yang gang du nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ston to //
translated: The three wisdoms are also taught as ‚Äúwhat is experienced.‚Äù

original: sgyu ma thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: sgyu ma thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'am /
translated: ‚ÄúAll illusions‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir sgyu ma'i rig pa rnam pa thams cad kyi nang nas bud med kyi sgyu ma ni shin tu khyad par du gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgyu ma'i rig pa rnam pa thams cad kyi nang nas bud med kyi sgyu ma ni shin tu khyad par du gsungs te /
translated: Or because the knowledge of illusion is said to be extremely special among all aspects, the illusion of a woman.

original: des ni de nyid gsungs te /
analyzed: des ni de nyid gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, that itself is said.

original: ye shes gsum gyi rang gi rig pa'i ngo bo des gsal bar yang dang yang du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi rang gi rig pa'i ngo bo des gsal bar yang dang yang du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By that, the nature of one‚Äôs knowledge of the three wisdoms is clearly experienced again and again.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In attachment, etc.

original: 'dod chags ni dang po'i skad cig ste dga' ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni dang po'i skad cig ste dga' ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Attachment is the first moment, called joy.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Freedom from attachment is called supreme joy.

original: de dag gi bar ni gnyis kyi bar ma ste 'dres par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi bar ni gnyis kyi bar ma ste 'dres par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The middle is the middle of the two, and is mixed.

original: ci zhe na gsum zhes bya ba ste /üîΩye shes kyi skad cig ma bstan te /
analyzed: ci zhe na gsum zhes bya ba ste / ye shes kyi skad cig ma bstan te /
translated: What is it? It is the third,üîΩ the moment of intuition,

original: nyams su myong ba'i dus su rang rig pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i dus su rang rig pa nyid kyis so //
translated: which is taught by one's own awareness at the time of experience.

original: de nyid lus kyi bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid lus kyi bshad pa ste /
translated: That itself is the body,

original: dbang po gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩdbang po gnyis gang mnyam par sbyor ba de /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / dbang po gnyis gang mnyam par sbyor ba de /
translated: which is taught by the union of the two organs, etc.

original: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba //üîΩzhes bshad do //üîΩ'dis rab tu bshad cing bstan pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba // zhes bshad do // 'dis rab tu bshad cing bstan pas na /
translated: The union of the two organs is the union of the vajra and the lotus.üîΩThis is taught by the first intuition,

original: dang po'i snang ba'i ye shes skye ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dang po'i snang ba'i ye shes skye ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: which is taught by the arising of the intuition of light,

original: ye shes gnyis ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ye shes gnyis ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: and the two intuitions,üîΩ which are taught by the arising of the intuition of the flame.

original: shes rab kyi ye shes dang / thabs kyi ye shes gang zhig mnyam par sbyor ba ste ;
analyzed: shes rab kyi ye shes dang / thabs kyi ye shes gang zhig mnyam par sbyor ba ste ;
translated: The wisdom of wisdom and the wisdom of method are united,

original: / mngon du gyur cing snyoms par 'jug pa zhes ston to //
analyzed: / mngon du gyur cing snyoms par 'jug pa zhes ston to //
translated: and are taught to be manifest and in union.

original: 'dis gnyis pa snang ba mched pa'i ye shes rab tu ston te /
analyzed: 'dis gnyis pa snang ba mched pa'i ye shes rab tu ston te /
translated: This teaches the second wisdom of the increase of appearance.

original: de nyid ye shes gnyis gang zhig snyoms par 'jug cing mngon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes gnyis gang zhig snyoms par 'jug cing mngon du gyur pa'o //
translated: That very wisdom of the two is united and manifest.

original: ji skad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúJust as it was explained‚Äù means

original: sngar bshad pa'i don nam /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i don nam /
translated: the meaning that was explained earlier

original: bla ma'i zhal nas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas gsungs pa'o //
translated: or what was said by the guru.

original: bya ba ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPractice‚Äù is accomplishment.

original: gang zhig ge she gsum pa skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang zhig ge she gsum pa skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When the third arises,

original: snang ba thob pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: snang ba thob pa zhes bshad do //
translated: it is explained as ‚Äúattaining appearance.‚Äù

original: de dag gi mi mthun pa'i chos ston te /
analyzed: de dag gi mi mthun pa'i chos ston te /
translated: Their discordant qualities are taught:

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúWhoever‚Äù and so on.

original: rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bslab pa 'dzin par mos pa'am /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bslab pa 'dzin par mos pa'am /
translated: Whoever the yogi is, if he is devoted to maintaining the trainings,

original: @170a * // ma ning dag la kun rdzob tu yang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba med par de'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i gsal ba las gyur pa nyid bskyed pa'i ye shes gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dir yid gnyis med par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: @170a * // ma ning dag la kun rdzob tu yang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba med par de'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i gsal ba las gyur pa nyid bskyed pa'i ye shes gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dir yid gnyis med par 'byung ba'o //
translated: For eunuchs, even conventionally, there is no union of the vajra and lotus, and so the three intuitions that arise from the clarity of that meditative concentration are called the three intuitions of generation.

original: ci lta zhe na /üîΩlan cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
analyzed: ci lta zhe na / lan cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
translated: How is it so?üîΩIt is said, ‚ÄúOnce, etc.‚Äù

original: / lan cig ces bya ba ni du ma ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: / lan cig ces bya ba ni du ma ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Once‚Äù means not many times.

original: nyams su myong ba lta bu ni nyams su myong ba nyid do //üîΩci ltar gang gi gang du rig sngags 'chang ni /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba lta bu ni nyams su myong ba nyid do // ci ltar gang gi gang du rig sngags 'chang ni /
translated: ‚Äú Like experience‚Äù means just experience.

original: mchog dang phrad nas bla na med pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba de /
analyzed: mchog dang phrad nas bla na med pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba de /
translated: Just as a knowledge-bearer, having met with the supreme, experiences unsurpassed bliss,

original: dus gzhan zhig na mnyam par gyur kyang /
analyzed: dus gzhan zhig na mnyam par gyur kyang /
translated: at another time, even though in meditative equipoise,

original: bde ba'i longs spyod kyi mtshan nyid dran pas nyams su myong ba ste /
analyzed: bde ba'i longs spyod kyi mtshan nyid dran pas nyams su myong ba ste /
translated: he experiences the bliss through the recollection of the characteristics of the enjoyment of bliss,

original: de'i lus kyi ba spu ldang bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de'i lus kyi ba spu ldang bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: and his body hair stands on end.

original: de bzhin du 'di yang bde ba lan cig nyams su myong ba dran pas shes pa cung zad kyang nyams pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di yang bde ba lan cig nyams su myong ba dran pas shes pa cung zad kyang nyams pa med pa'o //
translated: Likewise, this is not the slightest bit diminished by the recollection of the experience of pleasure.

original: de ltar ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi ji lta ba'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par shes nas de nyid dmigs zhes bya bar sbyor //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi ji lta ba'i dbye ba'i mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log par shes nas de nyid dmigs zhes bya bar sbyor //
translated: Thus, having understood the characteristic of the differentiation of the three kinds of intuition as it is, without error, one should apply oneself to the observation of that.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By intuition.

original: ye shes 'jug pa ni ye shes 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes 'jug pa ni ye shes 'jug pa'o //
translated: The engagement of intuition is the engagement of intuition.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni rang gi ngo bo yod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni rang gi ngo bo yod pa'o //
translated: Its nature is its own essence.

original: de'i phyir de nyid rang bzhin gyi ngo bo yid pa ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas yang dang yang du bsam par bya zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid rang bzhin gyi ngo bo yid pa ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas yang dang yang du bsam par bya zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, that very nature should be contemplated again and again by the yogi who is always equipoised.

original: de'i mthar thug pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i mthar thug pa'i don to //
translated: This is the ultimate meaning of that.

original: de'i dgongs pa bla na med pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa tshig le'ur byas pa drug gis bsgrub pa ston te /
analyzed: de'i dgongs pa bla na med pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa tshig le'ur byas pa drug gis bsgrub pa ston te /
translated: The intention of that is taught by six verses that establish the unexcelled scriptures, etc.üîΩAs it is said, beginning with:

original: ji ltar chu 'dzin byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar chu 'dzin byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: How does one become a cloud-bearer?

original: chu 'dzin ni sprin no//
analyzed: chu 'dzin ni sprin no//
translated: The water-bearer is the cloud.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha'i dkyil lo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha'i dkyil lo //
translated: The realm of space is the center of the sky.

original: snang ba gsum ni rna par shes pa gsum mo //üîΩma lus pa'i yul ni nye bar longs spyod pa ste /
analyzed: snang ba gsum ni rna par shes pa gsum mo // ma lus pa'i yul ni nye bar longs spyod pa ste /
translated: The three lights are the three consciousnesses.üîΩThe object of all is the enjoyment.

original: yul la nye bar bsgyur ba gong du sbyar ba ni longs spyod kyi don nyid do //
analyzed: yul la nye bar bsgyur ba gong du sbyar ba ni longs spyod kyi don nyid do //
translated: The object that is brought near is the enjoyment itself.

original: 'di 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni ye shes rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni ye shes rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Such is the three-fold intuition.

original: rang gi ngo bo khongs su ma chud pa de nyid kyis na //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo khongs su ma chud pa de nyid kyis na //
translated: Since it is not included in its own nature,

original: mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa ste /
translated: it is covered by the darkness of ignorance.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las yongs su bsags nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams su yongs su 'khyam pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las yongs su bsags nas 'gro ba lnga'i sems can rnams su yongs su 'khyam pa ste /
translated: Having accumulated virtuous and non-virtuous actions, sentient beings wander in the five destinies.

original: de yang mtshams med pa mi dge ba'i las kyis gcig nas gcig tu @170b dmyal bar rnam par smin cing sbyin pa la sogs pa yongs su bsags pas mtho ris su rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang mtshams med pa mi dge ba'i las kyis gcig nas gcig tu @170b dmyal bar rnam par smin cing sbyin pa la sogs pa yongs su bsags pas mtho ris su rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: Moreover, by non-virtuous actions such as the heinous crimes, they wander from one hell to another, and by the accumulation of generosity and so on, they wander in the higher destinies.

original: de ltar yang dang yang du skye ba phrag du mar skye zhing gcig nas gcig tu thob nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shes te /
analyzed: de ltar yang dang yang du skye ba phrag du mar skye zhing gcig nas gcig tu thob nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa shes te /
translated: Thus, he is born many times over, and having attained one after another, he knows the ripening of former karma.

original: dmyal ba la sogs pa la ni sems can rnams mya ngan byed pa dang / mtho ris la sogs pa la ni dga' ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: dmyal ba la sogs pa la ni sems can rnams mya ngan byed pa dang / mtho ris la sogs pa la ni dga' ba byed pa'o //
translated: In the hells, etc., he is sorrowful, and in the heavens, etc., he is joyful.

original: rang bzhin rnams kyi snang ba ni rang bzhin snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams kyi snang ba ni rang bzhin snang ba'o //
translated: The appearance of the natures is the appearance of the natures.

original: de'i tshul gyi sems can rnams 'khor ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba ste /
analyzed: de'i tshul gyi sems can rnams 'khor ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba ste /
translated: In that way, sentient beings experience the suffering of cyclic existence.

original: de yongs su shes pa med pas so //
analyzed: de yongs su shes pa med pas so //
translated: Because of the absence of complete knowledge of that.

original: slar yang rnal 'byor pas de nyid yongs su shes pas 'khor ba'i gzeb la grol ba thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slar yang rnal 'byor pas de nyid yongs su shes pas 'khor ba'i gzeb la grol ba thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Again, the yogi, by complete knowledge of that, attains liberation from the cage of cyclic existence. This is the meaning.

original: shes rab ces bya ba ni 'dir sngar bshad pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin te shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba ni 'dir sngar bshad pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin te shes par bya ba'o //
translated: Wisdom here is the nature of the wisdom of wisdom, as explained above, and is to be known.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, it says, the moon mandala, etc.

original: rang gi sems nyid rnal 'byor pa rang gi zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sems nyid rnal 'byor pa rang gi zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate one‚Äôs own mind as the nature of non-duality, like the yogi‚Äôs own reflection in the moon.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthen‚Äù is a different sequence.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i rjes su rnam par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i rjes su rnam par bsam par bya ste /
translated: After the meditation on the moon-disk, one should imagine

original: gang zhig rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma de dag bsgom pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgo pa po'i thabs kyi ye shes gsal bar byed pa ston to //
analyzed: gang zhig rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma de dag bsgom pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgo pa po'i thabs kyi ye shes gsal bar byed pa ston to //
translated: the meditation on the insignia such as the vajra, which is the method of the creator of the creation stage, revealing the gnosis.

original: de nyid kyis na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje sngon du bsgoms pas ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang rdo rje sngon du bsgoms pas ni /
translated: By that very thing, the meditation on the moon-disk and vajra,

original: sems dang sems las byung ba yongs su shes shing thabs dang shes rab sgoms pas kyang lha nyid kyi rnam par rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba yongs su shes shing thabs dang shes rab sgoms pas kyang lha nyid kyi rnam par rdzogs pa'o //
translated: one should understand the mind and mental factors, and by meditating on method and wisdom, one should complete the deity.

original: de nyid gsal bar ston te //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar ston te //
translated: That very thing is revealed.

original: phyag rgya bzhis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: By the four seals, etc.

original: chos dang / las dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi phyag rgyas bdag nyid shin tu bsrung ba byas nas lha de nyid kyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos dang / las dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi phyag rgyas bdag nyid shin tu bsrung ba byas nas lha de nyid kyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
translated: Having well protected oneself with the seal of the four characteristics of Dharma, karma, samaya, and gnosis, one abides in the form of that deity.

original: 'di rnams kyang las dang po pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyang las dang po pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: These are the stages of the beginner.

original: ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni gsal bas go sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni gsal bas go sla ba nyid do //
translated: As for ‚Äúand so on,‚Äù it is easy to understand from the clarity.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ston te /
translated: Now, the meditation of the completion stage is taught.

original: yongs rdzogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yongs rdzogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for ‚Äúperfect‚Äù and so on,

original: gang zhig stong pa gsum gyi rnam par dag pa de 'od gsal ba'i ye shes su brjod de /üîΩde yang ye @171a * //
analyzed: gang zhig stong pa gsum gyi rnam par dag pa de 'od gsal ba'i ye shes su brjod de / de yang ye @171a * //
translated: that which is purified by the three emptinesses is called the gnosis of lucid clarity.

original: shes gsum rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shes gsum rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is the purification of the three gnoses.

original: thams cad stong gnas zhes bya ba ni de nyid de kho na thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: thams cad stong gnas zhes bya ba ni de nyid de kho na thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAbiding in the emptiness of everything‚Äù is the abode of the purification of everything that is reality.

original: de nyid bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid ces bya ba ste rnam grangs so //
analyzed: de nyid bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid ces bya ba ste rnam grangs so //
translated: That is called the unsurpassed gnosis of omniscience.

original: 'di nyid ni dpe ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni dpe ste /
translated: This is the example.

original: 'gyur pa med cing bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'gyur pa med cing bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: It is changeless, and so on, with regard to action and so on.

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu ba spangs pa'o //
translated: It is free from the movement of conceptualization, which is changeable.

original: snang ba med pa ni snang ba spangs pa ste /
analyzed: snang ba med pa ni snang ba spangs pa ste /
translated: It is nonapparent, free from appearance,

original: rang bzhin rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis so //
translated: because of the sameness of natures.

original: gnyis med ces bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gnyis med ces bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba nyid kyis so //
translated: It is nondual, because of being free from the stain of passion and so on.

original: mthar phyin pa nyid kyis na mchog go //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa nyid kyis na mchog go //
translated: It is supreme, because of being ultimate.

original: legs par byed pa nyid kyis na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: legs par byed pa nyid kyis na zhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace, because of being well performed.

original: de yang 'di na'o zhes tshig gis brjod par nus pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di na'o zhes tshig gis brjod par nus pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: And it cannot be expressed by the words ‚ÄúIt is here,‚Äù

original: yod pa dang med pa'i tha snyad las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i tha snyad las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is beyond the conventions of existence and nonexistence.

original: de bas na rgyu 'od gsal ba las ye shes gsum rab tu skye ba ste /
analyzed: de bas na rgyu 'od gsal ba las ye shes gsum rab tu skye ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the three wisdoms arise from the luminous cause.

original: sgom pa 'dis kyang mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i sku rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgom pa 'dis kyang mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i sku rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: And by this meditation, the body adorned with the major and minor marks of a buddha is perfected.

original: 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyis rgyas par ston te /
analyzed: 'di nyid tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyis rgyas par ston te /
translated: This is taught extensively in twelve verses.

original: 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As it is said, etc.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrar brjod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrar brjod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: For what reason is it not called thusness?

original: 'on kyang nges pa rnyed pas na //
analyzed: 'on kyang nges pa rnyed pas na //
translated: But because of the attainment of certainty,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: it is called thusness.

original: stong pa chen po zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: stong pa chen po zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The great emptiness is the immovable samadhi.

original: til gyis gdab ni til gyi gang bu'o //
analyzed: til gyis gdab ni til gyi gang bu'o //
translated: The sesame seed is the sesame pod.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa'o //
translated: The sky-vajra is located in the realm of space.

original: g-yo ba med pas zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pas so //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pas zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pas so //
translated: Because of its immobility, it is free from the stain of mental conceptualization.

original: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The son of the Victor

original: rgyal pa'i sras gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal pa'i sras gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'o //
translated: is the son of the Victor, the youth Sarvarthasiddha.

original: 'di ni rnam dag min zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam dag min zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: This is not pure, meaning it does not bring about the attainment of buddhahood.

original: de bas na dri ma med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid la dmigs par gyis shig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bas na dri ma med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid la dmigs par gyis shig ces bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, focus on the clear light itself, which is the nature of stainless space.

original: der rang nyid 'dod pa'i ngo bo khyed la skye bar 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: der rang nyid 'dod pa'i ngo bo khyed la skye bar 'gyur pa ste /
translated: There, your desired nature will arise for you.

original: kun gyi dbang phyug gi mtshan nyid rdo rje'i sku yang thob nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rol par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: kun gyi dbang phyug gi mtshan nyid rdo rje'i sku yang thob nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rol par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: You will also attain the vajra body, which is the characteristic of the lord of all, and you will play in all world systems like the king of swans.

original: sgra de gnas nas mi g-yo ba'i ting nge @171b 'dzin btang ste /
analyzed: sgra de gnas nas mi g-yo ba'i ting nge @171b 'dzin btang ste /
translated: Having given up the concentration of remaining in that sound,

original: nam phyed kyi dus su byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam phyed kyi dus su byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur te /
translated: at midnight, you will be victorious over Mara under the Bodhi tree.

original: de nyid kyang 'gro ba la phan par bzhed pas brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyang 'gro ba la phan par bzhed pas brnyes pa'o //
translated: And that is also attained by the wish to benefit migrating beings.

original: de 'dir de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar ston te /
analyzed: de 'dir de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar ston te /
translated: Here, that is clearly taught by ‚Äúthat very wisdom of suchness,‚Äù and so on.

original: mtshams med pa lnga ni gang gi tshe las spyad pa de ma thag tu dmyal bar skye ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga ni gang gi tshe las spyad pa de ma thag tu dmyal bar skye ba de'i tshe /
translated: The five heinous acts are when, immediately after engaging in an action, one is born in hell.

original: mtshams med pa'i las zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams med pa'i las zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the ‚Äúact of immediate retribution.‚Äù

original: de yang rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: It is also of five kinds:

original: dgra bcom pa dang / pha ma gsod ba dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa dang / pha ma gsod ba dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'o //
translated: killing an arhat, killing one‚Äôs mother, killing one‚Äôs father, killing a bodhisattva who is irreversible, and causing a schism in the community.

original: bsam pa'i don rab tu ster ba'i nor bu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o //
analyzed: bsam pa'i don rab tu ster ba'i nor bu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o //
translated: A wish-fulfilling gem is a gem that grants the meaning of one‚Äôs wishes.

original: ma 'ongs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The future is what will occur.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Attachment and so forth are easy to understand.

original: ye shes gsum dang bral ba ni gzhan pa de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes gsum dang bral ba ni gzhan pa de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth reality is the other reality, which is free from the three wisdoms.

original: de yang bla ma'i zhal nas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang bla ma'i zhal nas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood from the guru‚Äôs mouth.

original: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i le'u gnyis pa las bstan pa de nyid las des par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i le'u gnyis pa las bstan pa de nyid las des par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: It should be understood from the two chapters of the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra.

original: dpal mchog ces bya ba ni rgyud do //
analyzed: dpal mchog ces bya ba ni rgyud do //
translated: The glorious supreme one is the tantra.

original: ral pa ni gcig dang gnyis dang gsum 'chang pa'o //
analyzed: ral pa ni gcig dang gnyis dang gsum 'chang pa'o //
translated: The crest is one, two, or three locks of hair.üîΩThus, one who desires manifest enlightenment by various signs

original: de ltar gang gis rtags sna tshogs pas mngon par byang chub par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gang gis rtags sna tshogs pas mngon par byang chub par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Thus, by means of various signs, one is held to be fully enlightened.

original: de dang bral na de kho na nyid thob par mi 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de dang bral na de kho na nyid thob par mi 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: If one is separated from that, one will not attain reality.

original: dang po'i las can gyi rnal 'byor pas gong nas gong du 'phel bar byas pas mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bus brgyad pa thob ste /
analyzed: dang po'i las can gyi rnal 'byor pas gong nas gong du 'phel bar byas pas mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bus brgyad pa thob ste /
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of beginner level, by increasing it more and more, attains the eighth stage by the result of perfection.

original: ye shes gsum bsgoms pa las sa bcu thob pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes gsum bsgoms pa las sa bcu thob pa'o //
translated: The ten stages are attained from the cultivation of the three intuitions.

original: rim pa de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi sa yang lhag par rtogs te /
analyzed: rim pa de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi sa yang lhag par rtogs te /
translated: By that process, the stage of Buddhahood is also realized.

original: thog mar gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor na /
analyzed: thog mar gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor na /
translated: If the wheel of Dharma is turned first in the pure divine abode,

original: de'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bskor bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bskor bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: then it will be turned in the Buddha-fields. This is the condensed meaning.

original: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi spyod pa gsum la goms par bya ba ston ta /üîΩspros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / shin tu spros pa med pa'i bye brag gis /
analyzed: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi spyod pa gsum la goms par bya ba ston ta / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / shin tu spros pa med pa'i bye brag gis /
translated: In the two verses beginning with ‚Äúthe source of Dharma,‚Äù the three practices are taught to be cultivated.

original: spyod pa rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: spyod pa rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The three types of practice are distinguished by the presence of conceptual elaboration, the absence of conceptual elaboration, and the complete absence of conceptual elaboration.

original: spyod pa rnam pa gsum po de nyid la spyod pas chos 'byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / bla na med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam pa gsum yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin @172a * //
analyzed: spyod pa rnam pa gsum po de nyid la spyod pas chos 'byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / bla na med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam pa gsum yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin @172a * //
translated: By engaging in those three kinds of conduct, one engages in the three kinds of enlightenment: the enlightenment of the Dharma realm, the enlightenment of the Dharma source, and the unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rol mo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ci ltar 'dod pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis kyang goms pas ci lta ba bzhin du goms par bya zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rol mo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ci ltar 'dod pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis kyang goms pas ci lta ba bzhin du goms par bya zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: One should also become familiar with the various kinds of play of desire and so on, the various kinds of emanations, and the various kinds of samƒÅdhi, such as the sky treasury, and so on, as one wishes.

original: 'dir 'dri ba bo kha cig  na re /
analyzed: 'dir 'dri ba bo kha cig  na re /
translated: Here, some questioners say:

original: bslab pa'i sbyor bas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: bslab pa'i sbyor bas ci zhig bya //
translated: What is the use of training?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pas na rnam par rtog pa las kyang skye ba ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pas na rnam par rtog pa las kyang skye ba ma yin pa de bas na /
translated: Because suchness is established by nature, it does not arise from conceptuality.

original: 'di ltar ci zhig goms par bya zhes gang zhig rtog pas 'dzin pa de la nges par bslab pa nyid 'byung pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar ci zhig goms par bya zhes gang zhig rtog pas 'dzin pa de la nges par bslab pa nyid 'byung pa ste /
translated: Thus, one who is grasped by the thought, ‚ÄúWhat is to be cultivated?‚Äù will certainly have the arising of training.

original: gang zhig rang bzhin rnams kyis snang ba'i bye brag rtogs pas bzhi po de kho na nyid kyang rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig rang bzhin rnams kyis snang ba'i bye brag rtogs pas bzhi po de kho na nyid kyang rtogs pa ste /
translated: One who realizes the distinctions of appearances by means of the natures also realizes the four realities.

original: spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag gis goms pa de'i 'bras bu thob cing /
analyzed: spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag gis goms pa de'i 'bras bu thob cing /
translated: The result of the cultivation of that is attained by means of the distinctions of the three types of conduct.

original: de lta bu la goms pas byang chub skye'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la goms pas byang chub skye'o //
translated: Awakening arises from the cultivation of that sort.

original: ji ltar shing las me zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ji ltar shing las me zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpe ni go sla'o //
translated: The example of ‚Äúfire from wood‚Äù and so on is easy to understand.

original: da ni slob ma yongs su brtags pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni slob ma yongs su brtags pa ston te /
translated: Now, the teaching of the examination of the disciple is shown.

original: gang zhig g-yo sgyu blo ldan pa //
analyzed: gang zhig g-yo sgyu blo ldan pa //
translated: One who is endowed with a mind of deceit

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: g-yo ni rang gi skyon 'chab pa la rab tu gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: g-yo ni rang gi skyon 'chab pa la rab tu gzhol ba'o //
translated: Deceit is the inclination to conceal one‚Äôs faults.

original: le lo ni brtson pa dman pa'o //
analyzed: le lo ni brtson pa dman pa'o //
translated: Laziness is inferior effort.

original: bla ma la smod pa ni bla ma la 'phyas 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma la smod pa ni bla ma la 'phyas 'dogs pa'o //
translated: Slandering the guru is disparaging the guru.

original: blo dman pa ni byang chub la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob par dka' ba 'dis ci zhig bya zhes blo zhum pa'o //
analyzed: blo dman pa ni byang chub la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob par dka' ba 'dis ci zhig bya zhes blo zhum pa'o //
translated: The inferior mind is the dispiritedness of one who thinks, ‚ÄúWhat is the use of this difficulty of attaining enlightenment through the three incalculable aeons?‚Äù

original: bla ma'i yon tan yongs su dor zhing skyon yang dang yang du rtog pa de nyid kyis na nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni spyod par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i yon tan yongs su dor zhing skyon yang dang yang du rtog pa de nyid kyis na nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni spyod par mi nus pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHe is afflicted‚Äù means that he is unable to practice, because of his complete disregard for the virtues of the guru and his repeated consideration of the guru‚Äôs faults.

original: de kho na nyid myur du yang thob par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid myur du yang thob par 'dod pa ste /
translated: He is desirous of quickly attaining reality.

original: ston pa'i tshig yang dag pa'i tshig ma yin zhes khro ba dang bcas shing g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: ston pa'i tshig yang dag pa'i tshig ma yin zhes khro ba dang bcas shing g-yo ba'o //
translated: He is angry and restless, thinking that the words of the teacher are not the right words.

original: 'khor gyi nang du gnas pa na 'byor zhing slar yang gcig pu dben pa na gnas pa'i mdung pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang du gnas pa na 'byor zhing slar yang gcig pu dben pa na gnas pa'i mdung pa ste /
translated: He is prideful, thinking that he is superior to others, and he is conceited, thinking that he is equal to his betters.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin ngan pas khyab pa'i bsam pa can gyi slob ma ngan pa de rang gi bu yin zhing byams pa'i gnas yin yang drung du gzhag par mi bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin ngan pas khyab pa'i bsam pa can gyi slob ma ngan pa de rang gi bu yin zhing byams pa'i gnas yin yang drung du gzhag par mi bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Such a disciple, whose mind is pervaded by a bad nature, should not be admitted into the presence of the guru, even if he is the guru‚Äôs own son and the object of his love.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what means?

original: bla mas zin pas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bla mas zin pas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase because of being taken up by the guru means

original: bla ma'i gzhan dbang ngam 'phags pa la phyogs pa ste /
analyzed: bla ma'i gzhan dbang ngam 'phags pa la phyogs pa ste /
translated: that one is dependent on the guru or is oriented toward the ƒÅryas.

original: bla ma bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma bla na med pa'o //
translated: The guru is unsurpassed.

original: rje'u'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rje'u'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase the class of the k·π£atriya, etc. refers to

original: rje'u'i rigs rje'u las skyes @172b pa'o //
analyzed: rje'u'i rigs rje'u las skyes @172b pa'o //
translated: the k·π£atriya class, which is born from the k·π£atriya caste.

original: rgyal rigs ni rgyal po'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyal rigs ni rgyal po'i rgyud do //
translated: The k·π£atriya class is the royal lineage.

original: mchog ni bram ze'i rigs so zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: mchog ni bram ze'i rigs so zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: The supreme class is the brahmin class.

original: gang zhig dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / yongs su shes pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa bla ma la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par lta ba /
analyzed: gang zhig dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / yongs su shes pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa bla ma la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par lta ba /
translated: The phrase one who has the qualities of virtue, who is fully knowledgeable, who is diligent, who views the guru as equal to the Buddha,

original: rgyal ba'i chos rnams gang blos rtogs shing dad pa dang ldan pa de la de skad du brjod do //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i chos rnams gang blos rtogs shing dad pa dang ldan pa de la de skad du brjod do //
translated: who has realized the Conqueror's teachings with his mind, and who is endowed with faith refers to one who is called the one who is endowed with faith.

original: de ni drin sbyin pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de ni drin sbyin pa'i gnas so //
translated: He is the one who is the object of the bestowal of kindness.

original: 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud gang gis mang du thos shing mthong ba de la de skad du brjod de /
analyzed: 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud gang gis mang du thos shing mthong ba de la de skad du brjod de /
translated: The phrase one who has seen and heard much through the tantras, such as the GuhyasamƒÅja refers to one who is called the one who has seen and heard much.

original: lung sbyor ba rtog pa la mkhas pa de lta bu yang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dman pa yin na /
analyzed: lung sbyor ba rtog pa la mkhas pa de lta bu yang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dman pa yin na /
translated: One who is skilled in the scriptures and reasoning is a teacher.

original: lung thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lung thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But if he is not well-versed in the scriptures, he cannot obtain the scriptures.

original: de ni rang la phan pa tsam yang byed par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ni rang la phan pa tsam yang byed par mi nus na /
translated: If he is not able to benefit himself,

original: ji ltar gzhan la phan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan la phan par 'gyur te /
translated: how can he benefit others?

original: bstan bcos smra zhing bstan bcos sgra sgrogs pa tsam ni bstan bcos kyi mchu'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos smra zhing bstan bcos sgra sgrogs pa tsam ni bstan bcos kyi mchu'o //
translated: The mere recitation of the scriptures is the mouth of the scriptures.

original: skyo ba'i rgyu ni skyo bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba'i rgyu ni skyo bar byed pa'o //
translated: The cause of weariness is weariness.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan no //
translated: Or means on the other hand.

original: skal pa dang ldan pa ni bsod nams can no //üîΩlung las yongs su 'thob pa yin la /
analyzed: skal pa dang ldan pa ni bsod nams can no // lung las yongs su 'thob pa yin la /
translated: One who is fortunate is meritorious.

original: don la phan tshun sbyar mi nus pa ni blo gros blun pa ste /
analyzed: don la phan tshun sbyar mi nus pa ni blo gros blun pa ste /
translated: One who is not able to connect the meaning of the scriptures with the meaning of the treatise is foolish.

original: de yang tshig gi yon tan med na brnyas par 'os pa'o //
analyzed: de yang tshig gi yon tan med na brnyas par 'os pa'o //
translated: And if he lacks the qualities of speech, he is worthy of contempt.

original: gnas drug ces bya ba ni mtha' drug gi rnam par dbye ba shes pa ste /
analyzed: gnas drug ces bya ba ni mtha' drug gi rnam par dbye ba shes pa ste /
translated: The six topics are the knowledge of the divisions of the six limits.

original: dran pa ni thos pa mi brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa ni thos pa mi brjod pa'o //
translated: Recollection is not forgetting what one has heard.

original: blo gros ni don 'dzin pa la myur ba'o //
analyzed: blo gros ni don 'dzin pa la myur ba'o //
translated: Intelligence is quickly grasping the meaning.

original: brtan pa ni don mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni don mi gtong ba'o //
translated: Steadfastness is not giving up the goal.

original: blo ni rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: blo ni rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: Intellect is skill in teaching.

original: de rnams su brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par 'byor zhing de dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams su brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par 'byor zhing de dang ldan pa ste /
translated: They are endowed with the perfect possession of effort in those.

original: bla ma la bsnyen bkur byas pas lung thob pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma la bsnyen bkur byas pas lung thob pa'o //
translated: They have obtained the transmission by serving the guru.

original: de lta bu'i rgyud ston pa dang / lung dbog pa'i gnas su rung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rgyud ston pa dang / lung dbog pa'i gnas su rung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: They are fit to be in the place of teaching and transmitting such a tantra.

original: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba las sems la dmigs pa'am /
analyzed: rim pa lnga pa'i dka' 'grel don gsal ba zhes bya ba las sems la dmigs pa'am /
translated: In the commentary on the five stages called Illuminating the Meaning,

original: bla na med pa'i dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i dgongs pa ste /
translated: it is the unsurpassed intention.

original: rim pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the second stage.

original: // / rim pa gnyis pa rab tu bstan nas /
analyzed: // / rim pa gnyis pa rab tu bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the second stage,

original: rim pa gsum pa ston te /
analyzed: rim pa gsum pa ston te /
translated: he teaches the third stage.

original: rdo rje can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The one with the vajra, etc.

original: rdo rje can rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje can rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams so //
translated: The ones with the vajra are the five transcendent lords.

original: de rnams kyi dang po gtso bo skyed pa po drug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dang po gtso bo skyed pa po drug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The first of them, the creator, is called the sixth.

original: rdo rje che ge zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje che ge zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
translated: The great vajra is Vajradhara.

original: phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni de la phyag @173a * //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni de la phyag @173a * //
translated: Having bowed means having bowed to him.

original: 'tshal nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'tshal nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Having bowed, I will explain the stage of self-consecration.

original: de la dang por zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de la dang por zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: Here, first is easy to understand.

original: rgyud rnam pa bzhi ni bya ba'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gong ma'i rgyud dang / gnyi ga'i rgyud de /
analyzed: rgyud rnam pa bzhi ni bya ba'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gong ma'i rgyud dang / gnyi ga'i rgyud de /
translated: The four types of tantra are Action Tantra, Yoga Tantra, Highest Yoga Tantra, and Non-Dual Tantra.

original: rgyud kyi bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: rgyud kyi bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: These are the four types of tantra.

original: de las dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni dgongs par rig pa'o //
analyzed: de las dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni dgongs par rig pa'o //
translated: Among them, intention means knowing the intention.

original: de nyid kyis na shes rab ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na shes rab ste /
translated: That itself is wisdom,

original: rtog cing dpyod nus pa'o //
analyzed: rtog cing dpyod nus pa'o //
translated: which is the ability to think and analyze.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi don rnam par dpyod pa ni thos pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi don rnam par dpyod pa ni thos pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The analysis of the meaning of body, speech, and mind is the retention of what is heard.

original: thos pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi gsung ngo //
analyzed: thos pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi gsung ngo //
translated: What is heard is the speech of Vajradhara.

original: bden pa rnam pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: bden pa rnam pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: The two truths are characterized by the conventional and the ultimate,

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: or by the nature of method and wisdom.

original: de la lhag par mos shing tshig gis mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de la lhag par mos shing tshig gis mchod pa ste /
translated: Worship is worship with words.

original: rnam pa lngas mchod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa lngas mchod pa'o //
translated: Worship is fivefold.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa khong du chud pa'o //
translated: The stage of self-consecration is the realization of the conventional truth.

original: phreng ba ni rim par sgrengs  pa'o //
analyzed: phreng ba ni rim par sgrengs  pa'o //
translated: The garland is the successive arrangement.

original: de dang ldan pa'i chu ni phreng pa dang ldan pa'i chu'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i chu ni phreng pa dang ldan pa'i chu'o //
translated: The water endowed with the garland is the water endowed with the garland.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni cod pan du bstan to //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni cod pan du bstan to //
translated: The perfect Buddha is taught as the crown.

original: me long ni me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: me long ni me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The mirror is the pure mirror-like pristine wisdom.

original: khang stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun ni go sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: khang stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun ni go sla ba nyid do //
translated: The seven verses beginning with empty house are easy to understand.

original: de'i tshig ces bya ba ni slob ma'i tshig go //
analyzed: de'i tshig ces bya ba ni slob ma'i tshig go //
translated: The words of that are the words of the disciple.

original: gsol pa btab pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa gsol pa'o //
analyzed: gsol pa btab pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa gsol pa'o //
translated: The request is the request for what is desired.

original: de la goms pa zhes bya ba ni mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: de la goms pa zhes bya ba ni mkhas pa'o //
translated: The skill is the skill in that.

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa ni go sla ba nyid kyis ma bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa ni go sla ba nyid kyis ma bshad pa'o //
translated: The self-consecration is not explained because it is easy to understand.

original: bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa 'od gsal ba yang bden pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa 'od gsal ba yang bden pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The stage of self-consecration is also the two truths,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
translated: existing as the nature of cause and effect.

original: rdo rje slob dpon ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon ni bla ma'o //
translated: The vajra master is the guru.

original: rang dbang med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i las gzhan la rag las pa ste /
analyzed: rang dbang med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i las gzhan la rag las pa ste /
translated: Lacking independence is being dependent on the karma of afflictions,

original: rang dbang med pa yin zhing /
analyzed: rang dbang med pa yin zhing /
translated: lacking independence.

original: gang zhig rang dbang du skye bar 'gyur ba der rgyu ni 'od gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig rang dbang du skye bar 'gyur ba der rgyu ni 'od gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The cause for being born with independence is clear light.

original: rang gi sems 'od gsal ba la mi 'jug pa'i byis pa rnams blang pa dang dor ba yongs su shes par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi sems 'od gsal ba la mi 'jug pa'i byis pa rnams blang pa dang dor ba yongs su shes par mi nus pa'o //
translated: The childish who do not enter clear light cannot know what to adopt and what to reject.

original: 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i brtson ra ste 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i brtson ra ste 'ching ba'o //
translated: The prison of samsara is called ‚Äúbondage.‚Äù

original: 'od gsal ba yongs su shes pa 'dis slar yang rnal 'byor pa bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba yongs su shes pa 'dis slar yang rnal 'byor pa bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
translated: By knowing clear light, the yogi again attains the state of the Sugata.

original: de ltar yongs su shes pa yod na gang zhig skye ba dang / @173b su yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yang med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar yongs su shes pa yod na gang zhig skye ba dang / @173b su yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yang med pa'o //
translated: Thus, if there is complete understanding, there is no one who is born and no one who dies.

original: 'khor ba nyid ni sems las logs shig na med par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba nyid ni sems las logs shig na med par shes par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that cyclic existence itself does not exist apart from the mind.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid mya ngan las 'das zhes brjod pa yin gsungs so //
analyzed: 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid mya ngan las 'das zhes brjod pa yin gsungs so //
translated: The complete understanding of cyclic existence is called nirvana.

original: rlung bsgom pa dang bral na sems kyi rang gi ngo bo go bar mi nus te /
analyzed: rlung bsgom pa dang bral na sems kyi rang gi ngo bo go bar mi nus te /
translated: If one is separated from the meditation on the wind, one is unable to understand the nature of the mind.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin skye ba'i rgyu rang bzhin las las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin skye ba'i rgyu rang bzhin las las 'byung ba'o //
translated: The nature of the mind arises from the cause of karma.

original: las las skye ba'o //
analyzed: las las skye ba'o //
translated: It arises from karma.

original: de'i phyir 'di phyi ma'i dus na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di phyi ma'i dus na /
translated: Therefore, in the future,

original: rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa gsum bsgoms pas /
analyzed: rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa gsum bsgoms pas /
translated: through the meditation on the three consciousnesses endowed with the wind,

original: rnal 'byor pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bur grub pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bur grub pa'o //
translated: the yogin‚Äôs body is accomplished like an illusion.

original: 'dir gnas pa yang thams cad de lta bu'i lus su mthong ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir gnas pa yang thams cad de lta bu'i lus su mthong ba ste /
translated: Here, the abiding is seeing everything in that way as a body.

original: gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: ‚ÄúForm‚Äù and so on are easy to understand.

original: gang zhig nang dang phyi rol gyi dbye bas bye brag tu mthong ba de thams cad ni sgyu ma nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig nang dang phyi rol gyi dbye bas bye brag tu mthong ba de thams cad ni sgyu ma nyid do //
translated: Whatever is seen as differentiated by the division into internal and external, all that is illusion itself.

original: de dag kyang phyin ci ma log par sgyu ma lta bu'i lus dang me long gi gzugs brnyan ni dpe'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang phyin ci ma log par sgyu ma lta bu'i lus dang me long gi gzugs brnyan ni dpe'o //
translated: And those are the examples of the illusory body and the reflection in a mirror, which are not erroneous.

original: kha dog ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog ni sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Color is blue, yellow, and so forth.

original: 'ja' tshon zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i gzhu'o //
analyzed: 'ja' tshon zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i gzhu'o //
translated: Rainbow is the bow of Indra.

original: ji ltar me long g-ya' med pa la gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du 'od gsal ba mngon du byas pas lha'i rnam pa 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar me long g-ya' med pa la gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du 'od gsal ba mngon du byas pas lha'i rnam pa 'byung ba'o //
translated: Just as a reflection appears in a clear mirror, so the divine form arises by the realization of clear light.

original: dngos po ni gzung pa dang 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni gzung pa dang 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Entity is the adherence to subject and object.

original: dngos po med pa ni de spangs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni de spangs pa'o //

original: de dag las rnam par grol ba rnam par bral ba'o //
analyzed: de dag las rnam par grol ba rnam par bral ba'o //
translated: Liberation from those is separation.

original: gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gang zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: It is Vajrasattva.

original: dbyer med pa nyid kyis na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pa nyid kyis na rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because of indivisibility.

original: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis na sems dpa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis na sems dpa'o //
translated: It is a sattva because of changelessness.

original: legs par bris pa ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: legs par bris pa ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa'o //

original: rnam pa'i mchog ni dpe byad bzang po ste /
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog ni dpe byad bzang po ste /

original: de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'o //

original: sku lta bas mi ngoms pa'i sku ni shin tu tshim pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku lta bas mi ngoms pa'i sku ni shin tu tshim pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The body that is never satisfied with seeing is the body that generates complete satisfaction.

original: 'di lta bu'i skus ni slob ma bzang po la gang zhig lung dpog pa'i dus bstan par bya ba ni bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i skus ni slob ma bzang po la gang zhig lung dpog pa'i dus bstan par bya ba ni bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa zhes bshad do //

analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta bu'i rnam pas gzhan rjes su gzung bar nus par 'gyur zhes bya ba dgongs pa'o //

original: nges par mtshon zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par mtshon zhes bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba'o //

original: khyab pa nyid kyis na bstan pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid kyis na bstan pa'o //

original: sgyu ma yongs su shes pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa khong du chud pa'o //üîΩde nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i @174a * //
analyzed: sgyu ma yongs su shes pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa khong du chud pa'o // de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i @174a * //
translated: The thorough knowledge of illusion is the understanding of conventional truth.

original: skur shes par bya ste /
analyzed: skur shes par bya ste /
translated: That itself should be known as the enjoyment body.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ni //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ni //

analyzed: thub pa dpe byang ldan pa ni // theg pa che la longs spyod pas //
translated: The Sage, endowed with the example of the Conqueror,üîΩis the Enjoyment Body,

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bshad do //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bshad do //

original: de nyid dri za zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab pas na dri za'i sems can no //
analyzed: de nyid dri za zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab pas na dri za'i sems can no //

analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni stobs thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'dis sprul pa'i sku yang ston te /
analyzed: 'dis sprul pa'i sku yang ston te /

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:üîΩThe Sage is said to be the Emanation Body,üîΩbecause he is the one who,

original: gang gis 'gro la phan pa ni //
analyzed: gang gis 'gro la phan pa ni //
translated: in order to benefit beings,

original: sna tshogs snyoms par mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: sna tshogs snyoms par mdzad pa ste //

original: ji srid 'khor ba rgyun mi 'chad //üîΩthub pa sprul pa'i skur bshad do //üîΩrdo rje sems pa'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: ji srid 'khor ba rgyun mi 'chad // thub pa sprul pa'i skur bshad do // rdo rje sems pa'i bdag nyid de //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chos kyi sku ston te /

original: ji skad du /üîΩgang zhig rnam dag zag med pa //
analyzed: ji skad du / gang zhig rnam dag zag med pa //
translated: As it is said:üîΩThe Sage‚Äôs Essential BodyüîΩis the one who has attained

original: rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa ste //üîΩthub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa ste // thub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
translated: all aspects, pure and immaculate.

original: de rnams rang bzhin mtshan nyid do //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de rnams rang bzhin mtshan nyid do //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
translated: That is the nature of the Essential Body.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'i tshig go //
translated: The word ‚Äúhimself‚Äù is a non-different expression.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: rdo rje 'chang snang bar bsgom pas /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang snang bar bsgom pas /
translated: by meditating on Vajradhara‚Äôs appearance,

original: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //

analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba nyid do //
translated: The words ‚Äúmantra, gesture, etc.‚Äù are easy to understand.

analyzed: dmigs pa med ces bya ba ni dmigs pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout objective support‚Äù means not clinging to the object of objective support.

original: de kun rdzob tu rang gi ngo bo med pa ste /üîΩde yang / sgyu ma lta bu shes par bya //
analyzed: de kun rdzob tu rang gi ngo bo med pa ste / de yang / sgyu ma lta bu shes par bya //
translated: That is, they are without own-nature in the conventional sense.üîΩAnd that is the meaning of the words

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äúone should know them to be like an illusion.‚Äù

original: de dag dngos po gang dang gang dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur pa de dang de /
analyzed: de dag dngos po gang dang gang dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur pa de dang de /
translated: Whatever things are the objects of the senses,

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na yang /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs na yang /

original: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //

analyzed: kun du kun nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs drug gi rang bzhin du bdag nyid ston pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEverywhere, in every way‚Äù and so on shows that he himself is the nature of the six lineages.

analyzed: mkha' las zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin las so //
translated: From the sky means from the sky-treasury meditative absorption.

original: ston par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ston par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: ston pa ni bla na med par 'gyur pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rnal 'byor pa khyad par du 'phags pas srid pa gcod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa khyad par du 'phags pas srid pa gcod ces bya ba ste /
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ cuts off existence because of being especially exalted.

original: sangs rgyas ni mdzad pa phun sum tshogs ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni mdzad pa phun sum tshogs ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'gro bar zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi khams zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de nyid ston te /
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni de nyid ston te /

original: @174b ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pas 'jig rten du gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: @174b ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pas 'jig rten du gshegs pa ste /
translated: Just as the BhagavƒÅn Buddha, wishing to benefit all sentient beings, comes into the world,

original: sems can gyi don la dmigs nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas gzhan du gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi don la dmigs nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas gzhan du gshegs pa'o //

original: de bzhin du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ye shes sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad lam dam pa la 'dzud par mdzad ces bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ye shes sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad lam dam pa la 'dzud par mdzad ces bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Similarly, the lord of yogins, following the various wisdoms, causes all sentient beings to enter the holy path.

analyzed: bsgom pa 'dis rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa mi 'grub pa cung zad kyang med pa'o //

analyzed: gsang sngags grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste /

original: mkha' spyod la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: mkha' spyod la sogs pa'o//
translated: The celestial realm, etc.

original: de rnams rang nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams rang nyid 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /

original: bdag gir 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag gir 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means one becomes the master.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: ye shes gsal ba mchog mthong nas //
analyzed: ye shes gsal ba mchog mthong nas //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni des rten byed // padma'i rdzing bu ngang pa'i tshogs //
translated: the yoginƒ´ is supported by that.

original: rol par byed pa ji bzhin no //
analyzed: rol par byed pa ji bzhin no //
translated: Like a flock of geese in a lotus pond,

original: zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: she plays.

analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //

original: las kyi lam ni rnam pa bcu'o //
analyzed: las kyi lam ni rnam pa bcu'o //

original: lus ni phung po'o //
analyzed: lus ni phung po'o //

original: byed pa po ni las sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po ni las sgrub pa'o //

original: 'bras bu ni de'i rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni de'i rnam par smin pa ste /

original: de dag thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad smig rgyu lta bur shes par bya'o //
translated: All of these should be understood to be like a mirage.

original: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for ‚Äúthis‚Äù and so on,

original: 'di ni sgyu ma la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin khong du ma chud pas bsdus pa la nye bar dmigs shing mngon par zhen pas nyams pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni sgyu ma la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin khong du ma chud pas bsdus pa la nye bar dmigs shing mngon par zhen pas nyams pa ste /
translated: this is the degeneration of those who, due to not comprehending the samƒÅdhi of illusion and so on, observe and cling to what is included in that.

analyzed: 'gro ba gang gi blo nyams pas de rnams la nad dang gnod pas na tshogs skyes bar 'gyur pa'o //

original: de ni sgyu ma'i sprul pa ste /
analyzed: de ni sgyu ma'i sprul pa ste /

analyzed: lam dam pa las nam zhig nyams par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: ci zhig byas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas she na /

analyzed: de dag gcig las phyogs gcig la brten pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne-sided‚Äù means up to ‚Äúbased on one side.‚Äù

analyzed: de lta bu thams cad yongs su spangs nas bla ma mchod pa la yid brtson par bya'o //

analyzed: gang gi phyir de mnyes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byung ba'o //

original: de yis bsod nams ma byas ci //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yis bsod nams ma byas ci // zhes bya ba la /
translated: What merit has not been created by him?

original: @175a * // slob dpon la cung zad kyang bsnyen bkur ma byas pa med pa'o //
analyzed: @175a * // slob dpon la cung zad kyang bsnyen bkur ma byas pa med pa'o //

translated: Moreover, all the conduct of engaging in excellent conduct is itself the conduct.

original: bsod nams ni dge ba'i las so //
analyzed: bsod nams ni dge ba'i las so //
translated: ‚ÄúMerit‚Äù is virtuous action.

original: dka' thub ni lus la sogs pa'i sdom pa'o //

translated: ‚ÄúAusterity‚Äù is the restraint of body, etc.

original: gang gi slob dpon dang / rdo rje 'chang dbyer med par blos brtags nas mchod pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi slob dpon dang / rdo rje 'chang dbyer med par blos brtags nas mchod pa byed pa'o //

original: shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang //
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang //
translated: and whatever is very delightful,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis ni go sla ba nyid do //

translated: ‚Äú Whoever‚Äù and so forth teaches the inferior disciple.

original: nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sngags pa'i bsam pa can no //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sngags pa'i bsam pa can no //
translated: He has the attitude of a mantra practitioner, with pride and overweening pride.

original: yang dag rig pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: yang dag rig pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i lam ste /

original: theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'o //

original: de sun 'byin pa la de kho na nyid bstan par mi bya'o //

analyzed: bla ma la gus bden par smra //
translated: ‚Äú Respectful to the guru, truthful,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

original: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag de nyid de de la de kho na nyid bshad par bya ba bstan to //
